cards.name: Void Squall
cards.originalText:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: Casting the card again due to the delayed triggered ability is optional. If you choose not to cast the card, or if you can’t (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the card will stay exiled. You won’t get another chance to cast it on a future turn.

If a spell with rebound that you cast from your hand is countered for any reason (either because of another spell or ability or because all its targets are illegal as it tries to resolve), that spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen, including rebound. The spell will be put into its owner’s graveyard and you won’t get to cast it again on your next turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, all delayed triggered abilities created by rebound effects trigger. You may handle them in any order. If you want to cast a card this way, you do so as part of the resolution of its delayed triggered ability. Timing restrictions based on the card’s type (if it’s a sorcery) are ignored. Other restrictions, such as “Cast [this spell] only during combat,” must be followed.
As long as you cast a spell with rebound from your hand, rebound will work regardless of whether you paid its mana cost or an alternative cost you were permitted to pay.
If you cast a spell with rebound from any zone other than your hand (including your opponent’s hand), rebound will have no effect.

If a replacement effect (such as the one created by Rest in Peace) would cause a spell with rebound that you cast from your hand to be put somewhere other than into your graveyard as it resolves, you can choose whether to apply the rebound effect or the other effect as the spell resolves.
Rebound will have no effect on copies of spells because you don’t cast them from your hand.
If you cast a card from exile this way, it will go to its owner’s graveyard when it resolves or is countered. It won’t go back to exile.

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Ambuscade Shaman
cards.originalText:
Whenever Ambuscade Shaman or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If Ambuscade Shaman enters the battlefield at the same time as other creatures you control, its ability will trigger for each of those creatures.

If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.originalText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.

foreignNames.name: 尽忠侍从
foreignNames.text: 当尽忠侍从死去时，将另一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 吃掉篮子里最后一颗头的龙能把仆人的头一起吃掉。

foreignNames.name: 盡忠侍從
foreignNames.text: 當盡忠侍從死去時，將另一張目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 吃掉籃子裡最後一顆頭的龍能把僕人的頭一起吃掉。

foreignNames.name: Suivant obéissant
foreignNames.text: Quand le Suivant obéissant meurt, renvoyez une autre carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Le dragon qui mange la dernière tête du panier peut prendre aussi celle du servant.

foreignNames.name: Pflichtbewusster Leibdiener
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Pflichtbewusste Leibdiener stirbt, bringe eine andere Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Drache, der den letzten Kopf im Korb verschlingt, hat Anspruch auf den Kopf des Dieners.

foreignNames.name: Servitore Diligente
foreignNames.text: Quando il Servitore Diligente muore, riprendi in mano un'altra carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Al drago che divora l'ultima testa nel cesto spetta anche quella del servitore.

foreignNames.name: 忠信な従者
foreignNames.text: 忠信な従者が死亡したとき、あなたの墓地にある他のクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 器の中に入っている最後の頭を食べた龍は、その従者の頭を食べることができる。

foreignNames.name: 책임감이 강한 수행원
foreignNames.text: 책임감이 강한 수행원이 죽을 때, 당신의 무덤에서 다른 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 바구니에 담긴 마지막 머리를 먹는 용은 천대받는다.

foreignNames.name: Assistente Obediente
foreignNames.text: Quando Assistente Obediente morrer, devolva outro card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: O dragão que comer a última cabeça da cesta fica com a do servo.

foreignNames.name: Усердный Служитель
foreignNames.text: Когда Усердный Служитель умирает, верните другую целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: Дракон, съедающий последнюю голову в корзине, может полакомиться головой слуги.

foreignNames.name: Asistente solícito
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Asistente solícito muera, regresa otra carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: El dragón que devora la última cabeza del cesto tiene derecho a degustar la del sirviente.

cards.name: Dutiful Attendant
cards.originalText: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Like their dragonlord, the Kolaghan take no trophies. They find true fulfillment only in the battle itself, in clash of steel and thunder of hooves.

foreignNames.name: 踩扁
foreignNames.text: 目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇安甘人与其龙王一般不留任何战利品。他们在战斗之中，在钢铁交鸣与蹄声雷动当中寻得真正的满足。

foreignNames.name: 踩扁
foreignNames.text: 目標生物得-4/-4直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇安甘人與其龍王通常不留任何戰利品。他們在戰鬥之中，在鋼鐵交鳴與蹄聲雷動當中尋得真正的滿足。

foreignNames.name: Aplatissement
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée gagne -4/-4 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: À l'instar de leur seigneur-dragon, les Kolaghan ne gardent pas de trophées. Ils s'épanouissent dans la bataille, bercés par le fracas des épées et le martèlement des sabots.

foreignNames.name: Plattmachen
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -4/-4 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Wie ihre Drachenfürstin interessieren sich die Kolaghan nicht für Trophäen. Ihre wahre Bestimmung finden sie im Kampf, im Klirren des Stahls und dem Donnern der Hufe.

foreignNames.name: Abbattere
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -4/-4 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Come il drago loro signore, i Kolaghan non conservano trofei. Trovano piena realizzazione solo nella battaglia stessa, nel clangore dell'acciaio e nel rombo degli zoccoli.

foreignNames.name: 押し拉ぎ
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－４/－４の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼らの龍王と同様に、コラガンの者たちも戦利品を求めない。彼らの欲求を真に満たすことができるのは、鉄と鉄がぶつかり合う音と蹄の轟音が響く戦いのみである。

foreignNames.name: 납작하게 만들기
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-4를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 콜라간 부족은 자신들의 용군주와 마찬가지로 전리품을 챙기지 않는다. 그들은 발굽이 지축을 흔들고 칼이 부딪히는 전투를 통해서만 진정한 만족감을 느끼기 때문이다.

foreignNames.name: Achatar
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe -4/-4 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Assim como seu soberano dragão, os Kolaghan não levam troféus. Eles só se sentem realizados no calor da batalha, no clangor das lâminas e no troar dos cascos.

foreignNames.name: Раздавить
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает -4/-4 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Как и их владычица драконов, колаганцы не берут трофеев. Их влечет сама битва, звон стали и грохот копыт.

foreignNames.name: Aplanar
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -4/-4 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Al igual que su señora dragón, los Kólagan no desean trofeos. Solo encuentran verdadera satisfacción en la batalla, entre el choque del acero y el retumbar de los cascos.

cards.name: Flatten
cards.originalText: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The cycle of life and death is rarely pretty.

foreignNames.name: 邪秽复生
foreignNames.text: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为以此法移回之牌的防御力。
foreignNames.flavor: 生死循环从不美丽。

foreignNames.name: 邪穢復生
foreignNames.text: 將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。目標生物得-X/-X直到回合結束，X為以此法移回之牌的防禦力。
foreignNames.flavor: 生死循環從不美麗。

foreignNames.name: Renouveau infâme
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. La créature ciblée gagne -X/-X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant l'endurance de la carte renvoyée de cette manière.
foreignNames.flavor: Le cycle de la vie et de la mort est rarement beau à voir.

foreignNames.name: Faulige Erneuerung
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -X/-X bis zum Ende des Zuges, wobei X gleich der Widerstandskraft der auf diese Weise zurückgebrachten Karte ist.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Kreislauf von Leben und Tod ist meist kein schöner Anblick.

foreignNames.name: Rinnovamento Ripugnante
foreignNames.text: Riprendi in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. Una creatura bersaglio prende -X/-X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è la costituzione della carta ripresa in questo modo.
foreignNames.flavor: Raramente il ciclo della vita e della morte è piacevole.

foreignNames.name: 邪悪な復活
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－Ｘ/－Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはこれによりあなたの手札に戻したカードのタフネスに等しい。
foreignNames.flavor: 生と死の輪廻の実態は、美しいものである場合の方が少ない。

foreignNames.name: 역겨운 부활
foreignNames.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴 종료까지 -X/-X를 받는다. X는 이런 식으로 되돌린 카드의 방어력이다.
foreignNames.flavor: 생명의 순환이 아름다운 경우는 드물다.

foreignNames.name: Renovação Hedionda
foreignNames.text: Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão. A criatura alvo recebe -X/-X até o final do turno, sendo X a resistência do card devolvido dessa forma.
foreignNames.flavor: O ciclo da vida e da morte não costuma ser muito bonito.

foreignNames.name: Нечестивое Обновление
foreignNames.text: Верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Целевое существо получает -X/-X до конца хода, где Х — выносливость карты, возвращенной таким образом.
foreignNames.flavor: Цикл жизни и смерти редко выглядит привлекательно.

foreignNames.name: Renovación hedionda
foreignNames.text: Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano. La criatura objetivo obtiene -X/-X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la resistencia de la carta regresada de esta manera.
foreignNames.flavor: El ciclo de la vida y la muerte es rara vez agradable.

cards.name: Foul Renewal
cards.originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the toughness of the card returned this way.

rulings.text: You must target a creature card in your graveyard and a creature on the battlefield to cast Foul Renewal. If the creature becomes an illegal target before Foul Renewal resolves, you’ll still return the creature card to your hand. If the creature card in your graveyard becomes an illegal target, the creature on the battlefield will be unaffected as there is no “card returned this way.”

cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the toughness of the card returned this way.

foreignNames.name: 秽言祝愿
foreignNames.text:
你可以从你手上展示一张龙牌，以作为施放秽言祝愿的额外费用。
目标牌手牺牲一个生物。如果于你施放秽言祝愿时，你展示了龙牌或操控龙，则你获得4点生命。

foreignNames.name: 穢言祝願
foreignNames.text:
你可以從你手上展示一張龍牌，以作為施放穢言祝願的額外費用。
目標玩家犧牲一個生物。如果於你施放穢言祝願時，你展示了龍牌或操控龍，則你獲得4點生命。

foreignNames.name: Invocation de vicelangue
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer l'Invocation de vicelangue, vous pouvez révéler une carte de dragon de votre main.
Le joueur ciblé sacrifie une créature. Si vous avez révélé une carte de dragon ou si vous contrôliez un dragon au moment où vous avez lancé l'Invocation de vicelangue, vous gagnez 4 points de vie.

foreignNames.name: Schandzungen-Anrufung
foreignNames.text:
Als zusätzliche Kosten, um die Schandzungen-Anrufung zu wirken, kannst du eine Drache-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen.
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl opfert eine Kreatur. Falls du eine Drache-Karte offen vorgezeigt oder einen Drachen kontrolliert hast, sowie du die Schandzungen-Anrufung gewirkt hast, erhältst du 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignNames.name: Invocazione della Lingua Corrotta
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare l'Invocazione della Lingua Corrotta, puoi rivelare una carta Drago dalla tua mano.
Un giocatore bersaglio sacrifica una creatura. Se hai rivelato una carta Drago o controllavi un Drago mentre hai lanciato l'Invocazione della Lingua Corrotta, guadagni 4 punti vita.

foreignNames.name: 忌呪の発動
foreignNames.text:
忌呪の発動を唱えるための追加コストとして、あなたの手札にあるドラゴン・カードを１枚公開してもよい。
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。あなたが忌呪の発動を唱えた時点でドラゴン・カードを公開したかドラゴンをコントロールしていたなら、あなたは４点のライフを得る。

foreignNames.name: 타락한 용언 마법
foreignNames.text:
타락한 용언 마법을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 당신의 손에서 용 카드 한 장을 공개할 수 있다.
플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 생물 한 개를 희생한다. 타락한 용언 마법을 발동하면서 당신이 용 카드를 공개했거나 용을 조종했다면, 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Invocação na Língua Vil
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar Invocação na Língua Vil, você pode revelar um card de Dragão da sua mão.
O jogador alvo sacrifica uma criatura. Se você tiver revelado um card de Dragão ou controlado um Dragão conforme conjurava Invocação na Língua Vil, você ganhará 4 pontos de vida.

foreignNames.name: Заклятье Дурной Речи
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Заклятья Дурной Речи вы можете показать карту Дракона из вашей руки.
Целевой игрок приносит в жертву существо. Если при разыгрывании Заклятья Дурной Речи вы показали карту Дракона или контролировали Дракона, вы получаете 4 жизни.

foreignNames.name: Invocación en lenguainfame
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar la Invocación en lenguainfame, puedes mostrar una carta de Dragón de tu mano.
El jugador objetivo sacrifica una criatura. Si mostraste una carta de Dragón o controlabas un Dragón al lanzar la Invocación en lenguainfame, ganas 4 vidas.

cards.name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Foul-Tongue Invocation, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Foul-Tongue Invocation, you gain 4 life.

rulings.text: You may cast Foul-Tongue Invocation targeting a player who controls no creatures. If you qualify for the “Dragon bonus,” you’ll just gain 4 life.

If one of these spells is copied, the controller of the copy will get the “Dragon bonus” only if a Dragon card was revealed as an additional cost. The copy wasn’t cast, so whether you controlled a Dragon won’t matter.

You can’t reveal more than one Dragon card to multiply the bonus. There is also no additional benefit for both revealing a Dragon card as an additional cost and controlling a Dragon as you cast the spell.

If you don’t reveal a Dragon card from your hand, you must control a Dragon as you are finished casting the spell to get the bonus. For example, if you lose control of your only Dragon while casting the spell (because, for example, you sacrificed it to activate a mana ability), you won’t get the bonus.

cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Foul-Tongue Invocation, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Foul-Tongue Invocation, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: Foul-Tongue shamans draw their powers from a dark twisting of the Draconic language.

foreignNames.name: 秽言啸鸣
foreignNames.text: 你每操控一个进行攻击的生物，目标对手便失去1点生命。你获得等量的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 秽言祭师从龙语的恶毒用法获得力量。

foreignNames.name: 穢言嘯鳴
foreignNames.text: 你每操控一個進行攻擊的生物，目標對手便失去1點生命。你獲得等量的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 穢言祭師從龍語的惡毒用法獲得力量。

foreignNames.name: Cri de vicelangue
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé perd 1 point de vie pour chaque créature attaquante que vous contrôlez. Vous gagnez autant de points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Les shamanes vicelangues tirent leurs pouvoirs d'un dialecte occulte issu du draconique.

foreignNames.name: Schandzungen-Kreischen
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl verliert für jede angreifende Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 1 Lebenspunkt. Du erhältst ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Macht der Schandzungen-Schamanen speist sich aus einer abartigen Verfremdung der drakonischen Sprache.

foreignNames.name: Urlo della Lingua Corrotta
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio perde 1 punto vita per ogni creatura attaccante che controlli. Tu guadagni altrettanti punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli sciamani della Lingua Corrotta traggono i loro poteri da un'oscura deformazione della lingua draconica.

foreignNames.name: 忌呪の金切り声
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはあなたがコントロールする攻撃クリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを失う。あなたはその点数に等しい点数のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 忌呪の巫師たちは、闇の力で歪めた龍詞をその力の供給源としている。

foreignNames.name: 타락한 용언의 비명
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 당신이 조종하는 각 공격생물마다 생명 1점을 잃는다. 당신은 그만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 타락한 용언의 주술사들은 용언을 사악하게 뒤틀어 힘을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Grito na Língua Vil
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo perde 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura atacante que você controla. Você ganha uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: O poder dos xamãs da Língua Vil vem de uma distorção sinistra da língua dragônica.

foreignNames.name: Вопль Дурной Речи
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент теряет 1 жизнь за каждое атакующее существо под вашим контролем. Вы получаете такое же количество жизней.
foreignNames.flavor: Шаманы Дурной Речи черпают силу в темных дебрях драконьего языка.

foreignNames.name: Grito en lenguainfame
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo pierde 1 vida por cada criatura atacante que controlas. Tú ganas esa misma cantidad de vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los chamanes lenguainfames obtienen su poder de una versión retorcida y oscura del idioma dracónico.

cards.name: Foul-Tongue Shriek
cards.originalText: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.
cards.text: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.

cards.flavor:
"Lord Silumgar has given you a second chance to please him."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

foreignNames.name: 净空坟地
foreignNames.text:
将任意数量的目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「龙王席穆嘉给了你第二次取悦他的机会。」
～龙王传令席亚拉

foreignNames.name: 淨空墳地
foreignNames.text:
將任意數量的目標生物牌從你的墳墓場置於你的牌庫頂。
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「龍王席穆嘉給了你第二次取悅他的機會。」
～龍王傳令席亞拉

foreignNames.name: Purge de tombe
foreignNames.text:
Mettez n'importe quel nombre de cartes de créature ciblées depuis votre cimetière au-dessus de votre bibliothèque.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Le seigneur Silumgar vous accorde une seconde chance de le satisfaire. »
—Siara, la Voix du Dragon

foreignNames.name: Grableerung
foreignNames.text:
Lege eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof oben auf deine Bibliothek.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Fürst Silumgar hat dir eine zweite Chance gegeben, ihm zu dienen."
—Siara Drachenzunge

foreignNames.name: Epurazione delle Tombe
foreignNames.text:
Metti in cima al tuo grimorio un qualsiasi numero di carte creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Il signore Silumgar ti ha dato una seconda possibilità di compiacerlo."
—Siara, la Voce del Drago

foreignNames.name: 墓所粛正
foreignNames.text:
あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードを望む枚数対象とし、それらをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に置く。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「シルムガル陛下は、陛下を喜ばせるための２度目の機会をお前にお与えくださったのですよ。」
——龍口のシアラ

foreignNames.name: 무덤 숙청
foreignNames.text:
당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 원하는 만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 서고 맨 위에 올려놓는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Purgar las tumbas

cards.name: Gravepurge
cards.originalText:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: You choose the order of the cards you put on top of your library.
You can cast Gravepurge with zero targets. If you do, you'll draw a card as the spell resolves.
If you cast Gravepurge with at least one target and all of those targets become illegal, the spell will be countered and you won't get to draw a card.

You can cast Gravepurge with no targets. If you do, you’ll just draw a card. However, if you cast it with at least one target and all of those targets become illegal, the spell will be countered and you won’t draw a card.

foreignNames.name: 贪欢客宝库
foreignNames.text:
当贪欢客宝库进战场时，放逐目标对手坟墓场中的所有牌。
你可以使用以贪欢客宝库放逐的地牌。
你可以施放以贪欢客宝库放逐的非地牌。你每回合不能以此法施放一个以上的咒语。

foreignNames.name: 貪歡客寶庫
foreignNames.text:
當貪歡客寶庫進戰場時，放逐目標對手墳墓場中的所有牌。
你可以使用以貪歡客寶庫放逐的地牌。
你可以施放以貪歡客寶庫放逐的非地牌。你每回合不能以此法施放一個以上的咒語。

foreignNames.name: Trésor de l'hédoniste
foreignNames.text:
Quand le Trésor de l'hédoniste arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez toutes les cartes depuis le cimetière de l'adversaire ciblé.
Vous pouvez jouer des cartes de terrain exilées par le Trésor de l'hédoniste.
Vous pouvez lancer des cartes non-terrain exilées par le Trésor de l'hédoniste. Vous ne pouvez pas lancer plus d'un sort de cette manière à chaque tour.

foreignNames.name: Schatz des Hedonisten
foreignNames.text:
Wenn der Schatz des Hedonisten ins Spiel kommt, schicke alle Karten aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners deiner Wahl ins Exil.
Du kannst Länderkarten spielen, die mit dem Schatz des Hedonisten ins Exil geschickt wurden.
Du kannst Karten wirken, die keine Länder sind und die mit dem Schatz des Hedonisten ins Exil geschickt wurden. Du kannst auf diese Weise nicht mehr als einen Zauberspruch in jedem Zug wirken.

foreignNames.name: Tesoro dell'Edonista
foreignNames.text:
Quando il Tesoro dell'Edonista entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia tutte le carte dal cimitero di un avversario bersaglio.
Puoi giocare le carte terra esiliate con il Tesoro dell'Edonista.
Puoi lanciare le carte non terra esiliate con il Tesoro dell'Edonista. Non puoi lanciare più di una magia per turno in questo modo.

foreignNames.name: 享楽者の宝物庫
foreignNames.text:
享楽者の宝物庫が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーの墓地にあるすべてのカードを追放する。
あなたは享楽者の宝物庫により追放された土地・カードをプレイしてもよい。
あなたは享楽者の宝物庫により追放された土地でないカードを唱えてもよい。あなたは毎ターン、この方法では１つしか呪文を唱えられない。

foreignNames.name: 쾌락주의자의 보물창고
foreignNames.text:
쾌락주의자의 보물창고가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대의 무덤에 있는 모든 카드를 추방한다.
당신은 쾌락주의자의 보물창고로 추방한 대지 카드를 플레이할 수 있다.
당신은 쾌락주의자의 보물창고로 추방한 대지가 아닌 카드를 발동할 수 있다. 당신은 이런 식으로 한 턴에 주문을 한 개를 초과해 발동할 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Tesouro do Hedonista
foreignNames.text:
Quando Tesouro do Hedonista entrar no campo de batalha, exile todos os cards do cemitério do oponente alvo.
Você pode jogar cards de terreno exilados com Tesouro do Hedonista.
Você pode conjurar cards que não sejam terrenos exilados com Tesouro do Hedonista. Você só pode conjurar uma mágica dessa forma por turno.

foreignNames.name: Сокровищница Гедониста
foreignNames.text:
Когда Сокровищница Гедониста выходит на поле битвы, изгоните все карты из кладбища целевого оппонента.
Вы можете разыгрывать карты земель, изгнанные Сокровищницей Гедониста.
Вы можете разыгрывать не являющиеся землями карты, изгнанные Сокровищницей Гедониста. Вы не можете разыгрывать более одного заклинания за ход таким образом.

foreignNames.name: Tesoro del hedonista
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Tesoro del hedonista entre al campo de batalla, exilia todas las cartas del cementerio del oponente objetivo.
Puedes jugar las cartas de tierra exiliadas con el Tesoro del hedonista.
Puedes lanzar las cartas que no sean de tierra exiliadas con el Tesoro del hedonista. No puedes lanzar más de un hechizo de esta manera cada turno.

cards.name: Hedonist's Trove
cards.originalText:
When Hedonist's Trove enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target opponent's graveyard.
You may play land cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove.
You may cast nonland cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove. You can't cast more than one spell this way each turn.

rulings.text: The cards are exiled face up.
The once-a-turn restriction of the last ability applies only to nonland cards. You can play a land card exiled with Hedonist’s Trove on the same turn you cast a nonland card exiled that way.

Playing a card this way follows the normal rules for playing the card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if one of the cards is a creature card, you can cast that card only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
Under normal circumstances, you can play a land card exiled with Hedonist’s Trove only if you haven’t played a land yet that turn.

If Hedonist’s Trove leaves the battlefield, any cards it exiled remain exiled. Those cards can no longer be played. Any future instance of Hedonist’s Trove (even one represented by the same card) will be a new object and won’t allow you to play those cards.

cards.name: Kolaghan Skirmisher
cards.originalText: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.text: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Marang River Skeleton
cards.originalText:
{B}: Regenerate Marang River Skeleton.
Megamorph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.originalText: Megamorph {6}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Minister of Pain
cards.originalText:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Minister of Pain exploits a creature, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

cards.name: Pitiless Horde
cards.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
Dash {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Rakshasa Gravecaller
cards.originalText:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

cards.name: Reckless Imp
cards.originalText:
Flying
Reckless Imp can't block.
Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Sidisi, Undead Vizier
cards.originalText:
Deathtouch
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi, Undead Vizier exploits a creature, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

cards.name: Silumgar Assassin
cards.originalText:
Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.
Megamorph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Silumgar Assassin is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 3 or less an opponent controls.

rulings.text: The powers of Silumgar Assassin and the creature trying to block it are checked only as blockers are declared. Changing the powers of either of those creatures after Silumgar Assassin is legally blocked won’t change or undo the block.
Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

"I Silumgar si nascondono dietro i mortali predatori delle loro paludi. Preferiscono complottare nei loro palazzi della giungla piuttosto che affrontarci."
—Khibat, guerriero Kolaghan

foreignNames.name: ウクドのコブラ
foreignNames.text: 接死
foreignNames.flavor:
「シルムガルの連中は、沼の危険な野性動物の後ろで隠れている。我々と相対するよりは、ジャングルの宮殿の中で悪巧みしている方が性に合っているようだな。」
——コラガンの戦士、キバト

foreignNames.name: 우쿠드 코브라
foreignNames.text: 치명타
foreignNames.flavor:
"실룸가르 녀석들은 무시무시한 야생동물로 가득한 늪지대에 틀어박혀 있다. 정정당당하게 싸우기보다는 뒤에 숨어서 수작을 부리겠다는 심산이야."
—콜라간 전사 키바트

foreignNames.name: Naja de Ukud
foreignNames.text: Toque mortífero
foreignNames.flavor:
"Os Silumgar escondem-se atrás da fauna letal de seus pântanos. Eles preferem conspirar refugiados em seus palácios nas selvas a nos enfrentar."
— Khibat, guerreiro de Kolaghan

foreignNames.name: Укудская Кобра
foreignNames.text: Смертельное касание
foreignNames.flavor:
«Силумгарцы прячутся за спины смертоносных обитателей своих болот. Они будут строить коварные планы в своих дворцах в джунглях, но не отважатся сойтись с нами лицом к лицу».
— Кибат, колаганский воин

foreignNames.name: Cobra de Ukud
foreignNames.text: Toque mortal.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los Sílumgar se esconden tras la fauna mortal de sus pantanos. Prefieren hacer planes desde sus palacios en la jungla antes que enfrentarse a nosotros".
—Kibat, guerrero de Kólagan

cards.name: Ukud Cobra
cards.originalText: Deathtouch
cards.text: Deathtouch

cards.flavor:
"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

foreignNames.name: 终极代价
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标单色生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「意识到自己行将死去此事比死亡本身要可怕得多。」
～席穆嘉族宰相谢迪西

foreignNames.name: 終極代價
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標單色生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「意識到自己行將死去此事比死亡本身要可怕得多。」
～席穆嘉族宰相謝迪西

foreignNames.name: Prix ultime
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature monochrome ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Comprendre que l'on est en train de mourir est bien plus effrayant que la mort elle-même. »
—Sidisi, vizir de Silumgar

foreignNames.name: Äußerster Preis
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine einfarbige Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Erkenntnis, dass die letzte Stunde geschlagen hat, ist viel schlimmer als der Tod selbst."
—Sidisi, Silumgar-Wesirin

foreignNames.name: Prezzo Definitivo
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura monocolore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Rendersi conto che si sta per morire è molto più terrificante della morte in sé."
—Sidisi, visir Silumgar

foreignNames.name: 究極の価格
foreignNames.text: 単色のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「自分が死につつあるということを自覚することは、死そのものよりはるかに恐ろしいものだ。」
——シルムガルの大臣、シディシ

foreignNames.name: 궁극의 대가
foreignNames.text: 단색 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"죽음 자체보다는 자신이 죽어간다는 것을 깨닫는 게 더 끔찍하다."
—실룸가르 고관 시디시

foreignNames.name: Preço Final
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo monocolorida.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Perceber a proximidade da morte é mais aterrorizante do que a morte em si."
— Sidisi, vizir de Silumgar

foreignNames.name: Последняя Цена
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое одноцветное существо.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Понимание того, что ты умираешь, намного страшнее самой смерти».
— Сидиси, силумгарский визирь

foreignNames.name: Precio final
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura monocolor objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Descubrir que te estás muriendo da mucho más miedo que la propia muerte".
—Sidisi, visir de Sílumgar

rulings.text: A monocolored creature has exactly one color.
Face-down creatures and most artifact creatures are not monocolored.

cards.text: Destroy target monocolored creature.

cards.flavor:
"This pestilence robs us of glorious death in battle. We starve to death with full bellies and drown trying to slake our unnatural thirst."
—Kerai Hatesinger, Kolaghan warrior

foreignNames.name: 猛毒疫病
foreignNames.text: 衍生生物得-2/-2。
foreignNames.flavor:
「瘟疫夺走了我们战死沙场的荣耀。我们饱食却饿死，试图解消异样口渴时却被淹死。」
～寇安甘族战士咏仇凯莱

foreignNames.name: 猛毒疫病
foreignNames.text: 衍生生物得-2/-2。
foreignNames.flavor:
「瘟疫奪走了我們戰死沙場的榮耀。我們飽食卻餓死，試圖解消異樣口渴時卻被淹死。」
～寇安甘族戰士詠仇凱萊

foreignNames.name: Peste virulente
foreignNames.text: Les jetons de créature gagnent -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Cette pestilence nous prive d'une mort glorieuse au combat. Nous sommes repus, mais nous mourons de faim ; nous nous noyons en tentant d'étancher notre soif contre nature. »
—Keraï Chantehaine, guerrier de Kolaghan

foreignNames.name: Verheerende Seuche
foreignNames.text: Kreaturenspielsteine erhalten -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Diese Epidemie raubt uns die Gelegenheit, heldenhaft in der Schlacht zu fallen. Wir verhungern mit vollen Bäuchen und ertrinken bei dem Versuch, unseren endlosen Durst zu stillen."
—Kerai Hassgesang, Kolaghan-Krieger

foreignNames.name: Piaga Virulenta
foreignNames.text: Le pedine creatura prendono -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Questa pestilenza ci priva di una gloriosa morte in battaglia. Moriamo di fame con il ventre pieno e affoghiamo cercando di placare la nostra sete innaturale."
—Kerai Cantore d'Odio, guerriero Kolaghan

foreignNames.name: 悪性の疫病
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー・トークンは－２/－２の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor:
「この疫病は、我々から戦いで栄誉ある戦死を遂げる機会を奪いやがる。我々は満腹の状態で餓死し、奇怪な喉の渇きを満たそうとして溺死しちまう。」
——コラガンの戦士、憎悪の歌い手ケライ

foreignNames.name: 치명적인 전염병
foreignNames.text: 생물 토큰들은 -2/-2를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"이 전염병 때문에 전장에서 명예롭게 죽을 수 없잖아. 배가 부른데 굶어 죽고 갈증에 허덕이면서 익사하는 꼴이야."
—콜라간 전사 케라이 헤이트싱어

foreignNames.name: Praga Virulenta
foreignNames.text: As fichas de criatura recebem -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Esta peste nos furta a morte gloriosa em batalha. Morremos de fome com a barriga cheia e nos afogamos ao tentar aplacar esta sede insaciável."
— Kerai Cantafúria, guerreiro de Kolaghan

foreignNames.name: Заразный Мор
foreignNames.text: Фишки существ получают -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Эта зараза лишает нас славной смерти в бою. Мы умираем от голода, набив животы, и тонем, пытаясь утолить неестественную жажду».
— Керай Певец Ненависти, колаганский воин

foreignNames.name: Plaga virulenta
foreignNames.text: Las fichas de criatura obtienen -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Esta pestilencia nos arrebata la posibilidad de morir heroicamente en batalla. Morimos de hambre con la barriga llena y nos ahogamos tratando de saciar una sed irreal".
—Kerai, el Cantor del Odio, guerrero de Kólagan

cards.name: Vulturous Aven
cards.originalText:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn't on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

cards.text:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

cards.flavor: The crumbling temples on the tortoise's back are monuments to the decadence of the ancient Sultai. Though it harkens back to the era of the khans, Silumgar allows it to walk his territory as a warning to those who would oppose him.

foreignNames.name: 漫行墓壳龟
foreignNames.flavor: 龟背上的残破殿堂是古苏勒台衰败的见证。虽然眼睹此物会让人回想起过往可汗的时代，但席穆嘉仍允许此龟在自己的领地内漫步，以此警告意图反对它的势力。

foreignNames.name: 漫行墓殼龜
foreignNames.flavor: 龜背上的殘破殿堂是古蘇勒台衰敗的見證。雖然眼睹此物會讓人回想起過往可汗的時代，但席穆嘉仍允許此龜在自己的領地內漫步，以此警告意圖反對它的勢力。

foreignNames.name: Carapace-nécropole errante
foreignNames.flavor: Les temples décrépits sur le dos de la tortue témoignent de la décadence des anciens Sultaï. Bien qu'elle rappelle l'époque des khans, Silumgar l'autorise à parcourir son territoire pour mettre en garde ceux qui voudraient s'opposer à lui.

foreignNames.name: Wandernde Gruftschildkröte
foreignNames.flavor: Die einstürzenden Tempel auf dem Rücken der Schildkröte sind ein Relikt aus der Zeit der Khane und erinnern an die Dekadenz der Sultai. Silumgar duldet sie in seinem Territorium als Mahnmal für alle, die sich ihm widersetzen wollen.

foreignNames.name: Tombaguscio Errante
foreignNames.flavor: I templi in rovina sul dorso della tartaruga sono monumenti alla decadenza degli antichi Sultai. Anche se rappresenta l'epoca dei khan, Silumgar permette che vaghi per il suo territorio, come ammonimento per coloro che osano contrastarlo.

foreignNames.name: 放浪する墓甲羅
foreignNames.flavor: 亀の甲羅の上に建てられている崩壊した寺院は、太古のスゥルタイの退廃を示す遺跡である。かつてのカンの時代を思い起こさせるものではあるが、自分に歯向かおうとする者たちへの警告として、それが領内を徘徊することをシルムガルは許している。

foreignNames.name: 헤메는 무덤거북
foreignNames.flavor: 거북의 등에 있는 무너져가는 신전은 고대 술타이 족의 퇴폐적인 성격을 잘 드러낸다. 칸들이 득세하던 시절의 유산이지만 실룸가르는 자신에게 대항하는 자들에게 경고하는 의미로 이 거북이 마음대로 돌아다니게 한다.

foreignNames.name: Casco-tumba Errante
foreignNames.flavor: Os templos arruinados sobre o casco da tartaruga são monumentos à decadência dos antigos Sultai. Silumgar permite que essas criaturas tão antigas quanto a era dos khans caminhem em seu território como advertência aos seus opositores.

foreignNames.name: Кладбищенская Гигантопаха
foreignNames.flavor: Разваливающиеся храмы на панцире черепахи стали памятником падению древних султайцев. И хотя она напоминает об эпохе ханов, Силумгар позволил ей бродить по своим владениям в качестве предупреждения для тех, кто осмелится бросить ему вызов.

foreignNames.name: Caparatúmulo errante
foreignNames.flavor: Los templos en ruinas sobre el caparazón de la tortuga son monumentos a la decadencia de los antiguos Sultai. Aunque su existencia se remonta a la época de los kans, Sílumgar le permite vagar por su territorio... como aviso para quienes pretendan oponerse a él.

cards.name: Atarka Efreet
cards.originalText:
Megamorph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

foreignNames.name: 安塔卡族猛击手
foreignNames.text: 强横～{3}{R}{R}：每个由你操控的生物本回合中只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。只能于由你操控之生物的力量总和等于或大于8时起动此异能。

foreignNames.name: 安塔卡族猛擊手
foreignNames.text: 強橫～{3}{R}{R}：每個由你操控的生物本回合中只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。只能於由你操控之生物的力量總和等於或大於8時起動此異能。

foreignNames.name: Marteleur d'Atarka
foreignNames.text: Redoutable — {3}{R}{R} : Chaque créature que vous contrôlez ne peut pas être bloquée ce tour-ci excepté par deux créatures ou plus. N'activez cette capacité que si les créatures que vous contrôlez ont une force totale supérieure ou égale à 8.

foreignNames.name: Atarka-Prügler
foreignNames.text: Gewaltig — {3}{R}{R}: Jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls die Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, eine Gesamtstärke von 8 oder mehr haben.

foreignNames.name: Assaltatore Atarka
foreignNames.text: Formidabile — {3}{R}{R}: Ogni creatura che controlli non può essere bloccata in questo turno tranne che da due o più creature. Attiva questa abilità solo se le creature che controlli hanno una forza totale pari o superiore a 8.

foreignNames.name: アタルカの打撃手
foreignNames.text: 圧倒 — {3}{R}{R}：このターン、あなたがコントロールする各クリーチャーは、２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。この能力は、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーのパワーの合計が８以上であるときにのみ起動できる。

foreignNames.name: 아타르카 난투꾼
foreignNames.text: 강대 — {3}{R}{R}: 당신이 조종하는 각 생물은 이 턴에 두 개 이상의 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다. 당신이 조종하는 생물들의 공격력 총합이 8 이상인 경우에만 이 능력을 활성화한다.

foreignNames.name: Arrombador de Atarka
foreignNames.text: Formidável — {3}{R}{R}: Cada criatura que você controla só pode ser bloqueada neste turno por duas ou mais criaturas. Ative esta habilidade somente se as criaturas que você controla tiverem um total de poder igual ou superior a 8.

foreignNames.name: Атаркский Молотильщик
foreignNames.text: Внушительность — {3}{R}{R}: каждое существо под вашим контролем не может быть заблокировано в этом ходу менее чем двумя существами. Активируйте эту способность, только если сумма значений силы существ под вашим контролем равна 8 или больше.

foreignNames.name: Rompepuertas de Atarka
foreignNames.text: Formidable — {3}{R}{R}: Cada criatura que controlas no puede ser bloqueada este turno excepto por dos o más criaturas. Activa esta habilidad solo si las criaturas que controlas tienen una fuerza total de 8 o más.

cards.name: Atarka Pummeler
cards.originalText: Formidable — {3}{R}{R}: Each creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: Activating Atarka Pummeler’s ability more than once conveys no additional benefit to creatures you control.

If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.text: Formidable — {3}{R}{R}: Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor:
"Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence."
—Arel, Unseen Whisperer

foreignNames.name: 狂战士猛攻
foreignNames.text: 由你操控且进行攻击的生物具有连击异能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「安塔卡的族人忍饥挨饿，而她却饱食他们狩猎的成果。他们不得不征服更多的土地，只为他们自己的生存。」
～隐密低语者阿瑞尔

foreignNames.name: 狂戰士猛攻
foreignNames.text: 由你操控且進行攻擊的生物具有連擊異能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「安塔卡的族人忍饑挨餓，而她卻飽食他們狩獵的成果。他們不得不征服更多的土地，只為他們自己的生存。」
～隱密低語者阿瑞爾

foreignNames.name: Carnage des berserkers
foreignNames.text: Les créatures attaquantes que vous contrôlez ont la double initiative.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Le peuple d'Atarka meurt de faim tandis qu'elle se repaît du gibier qu'il chasse. Il doit conquérir toujours plus de terres s'il veut subsister. »
—Arel, chuchoteuse inaperçue

foreignNames.name: Berserker-Ansturm
foreignNames.text: Angreifende Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Doppelschlag.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Atarkas Volk hungert, während sie sich mit der Beute ihrer Jäger den Bauch vollschlägt. Sie müssen immer mehr Länder erobern, nur um ihren Eigenbedarf decken zu können."
—Arel die Ungesehene Flüsterin

foreignNames.name: Assalto dei Berserker
foreignNames.text: Le creature attaccanti che controlli hanno doppio attacco.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Mentre la sua gente muore di fame, Atarka banchetta con il bottino delle loro battute di caccia. Devono costantemente conquistare nuove terre per la propria sussistenza."
—Arel, Sussurratrice Occulta

foreignNames.name: 狂戦士たちの猛攻
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールする攻撃クリーチャーは二段攻撃を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor:
「アタルカの民が飢えるなか、アタルカは民の狩りがもたらした恵みを食べ続けています。彼らは己の生存のために、より多くの領土を獲得しなければならないのです。」
——見えざる囁く者、アレル

foreignNames.name: 광전사의 맹공
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 공격생물들은 이단공격을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"아타르카 사람들은 아타르카가 사냥감으로 포식할 때 굶주린다. 그들은 생존을 위해서라도 더 많은 영토를 확보해야 한다."
—숨어서 속삭이는 아렐

foreignNames.name: Investida dos Amoques
foreignNames.text: As criaturas atacantes que você controla têm golpe duplo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"O povo de Atarka morre de fome enquanto ela se regozija na carne de suas caçadas. Eles precisam conquistar sempre mais terras para manter sua subsistência."
— Arel, a Sussurradora Oculta

foreignNames.name: Натиск Берсерков
foreignNames.text: Атакующие существа под вашим контролем имеют Двойной удар.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Подданные Атарки голодают, а она пирует, пожирая принесенную ими добычу. Они должны захватывать все новые земли лишь для того, чтобы не умереть от голода».
— Арель, Невидимая Шепчущая

foreignNames.name: Embestida de berserkers
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas atacantes que controlas tienen la habilidad de dañar dos veces.
foreignNames.flavor:
"El pueblo de Atarka se muere de hambre mientras ella devora banquetes con las presas de sus cazas. El clan debe conquistar aún más territorio por su propia subsistencia".
—Arel, la Susurradora Oculta

cards.name: Berserkers' Onslaught
cards.originalText: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

cards.flavor: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

foreignNames.name: 熔岩通贯
foreignNames.text: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。直到你下一个回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 很久以前，安塔卡征服了圜焰克达，凭借将火焰荣光传扬世界的许诺赢得了魔神的支持。

foreignNames.name: 熔岩通貫
foreignNames.text: 放逐你牌庫頂的X張牌。直到你下一個回合結束，你可以使用這些牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 很久以前，安塔卡征服了圜焰克達，憑借將火焰榮光傳揚世界的許諾贏得了魔神的支持。

foreignNames.name: Communion avec la lave
foreignNames.text: Exilez les X cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Jusqu'à la fin de votre prochain tour, vous pouvez jouer ces cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Jadis, Atarka conquit Qadat, la Frange ardente, ralliant les éfrits à sa cause en leur promettant de répandre la gloire du feu dans le monde entier.

foreignNames.name: Zwiesprache mit der Lava
foreignNames.text: Schicke die obersten X Karten deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Bis zum Ende deines nächsten Zuges kannst du diese Karten spielen.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka eroberte vor langer Zeit das Feuergebirge Qadat, indem sie die dortigen Ifrite mit dem Versprechen lockte, den Ruhm des Feuers in der ganzen Welt zu verbreiten.

foreignNames.name: Comunione con la Lava
foreignNames.text: Esilia le prime X carte del tuo grimorio. Fino alla fine del tuo prossimo turno, puoi giocare quelle carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka conquistò Qadat, l'Orlo Infuocato, molto tempo fa, convincendo i suoi efreet con la promessa di diffondere la gloria della fiamma in tutto il mondo.

foreignNames.name: 溶岩との融和
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からＸ枚のカードを追放する。次のあなたのターンのターン終了時まで、あなたはそれらのカードをプレイしてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: アタルカは遠い昔に炎の縁カダットをその支配下に置いた。イフリートたちには炎の栄光を全世界に広めると約束し、彼らの心をつかみ取った。

foreignNames.name: 용암과의 대화
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 X장을 추방한다. 당신은 당신의 다음 턴종료까지 그 카드들을 플레이할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 아타르카는 오래 전 불의 가장자리, 콰다트를 정복했다. 그때 그는 이프리트들에게 자신이 온 세상에 불의 영광을 알리겠다고 약속했다.

foreignNames.name: Comungar com a Lava
foreignNames.text: Exile os X cards do topo de seu grimório. Até o final do seu próximo turno, você pode jogar esses cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka conquistou Qadat, o Círculo de Fogo, há muito tempo, convencendo os efrites com a promessa de espalhar sua glória ígnea por todo o mundo.

foreignNames.name: Причащение Лавой
foreignNames.text: Изгоните X верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете разыграть те карты до конца вашего следующего хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Атарка уже давно захватила Кадат, Огненный Разлом. Она пообещала его ифритам распространить славу огня по всему миру.

foreignNames.name: En comunión con la lava
foreignNames.text: Exilia las primeras X cartas de tu biblioteca. Hasta el final de tu próximo turno, puedes jugar esas cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka conquistó hace tiempo Qadat, el Borde Ígneo, y ganó a los efrit para su causa con la promesa de que expandiría la gloria del fuego por el mundo.

cards.name: Commune with Lava
cards.originalText: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

rulings.text: The cards are exiled face up.

Playing a card this way follows the normal rules for playing the card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if one of the cards is a creature card, you can cast that card only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
Under normal circumstances, you can play a land card exiled with Commune with Lava only if you haven’t played a land yet that turn.
Any cards you don’t play will remain exiled.

cards.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

foreignNames.name: 山口元素
foreignNames.text:
{R}，{T}，牺牲山口元素：山口元素对目标生物造成4点伤害。
强横～{2}{R}：山口元素基础力量为8直到回合结束。只能于由你操控之生物的力量总和等于或大于8时起动此异能。

foreignNames.name: 山口元素
foreignNames.text:
{R}，{T}，犧牲山口元素：山口元素對目標生物造成4點傷害。
強橫～{2}{R}：山口元素基礎力量為8直到回合結束。只能於由你操控之生物的力量總和等於或大於8時起動此異能。

foreignNames.name: Élémental de cratère
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Élémental de cratère : L'Élémental de cratère inflige 4 blessures à la créature ciblée.
Redoutable — {2}{R} : L'Élémental de cratère a une force de base de 8 jusqu'à la fin du tour. N'activez cette capacité que si les créatures que vous contrôlez ont une force totale supérieure ou égale à 8.

foreignNames.name: Krater-Elementar
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, opfere das Krater-Elementar: Das Krater-Elementar fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
Gewaltig — {2}{R}: Das Krater-Elementar hat Basis-Stärke 8 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls die Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, eine Gesamtstärke von 8 oder mehr haben.

foreignNames.name: Elementale del Cratere
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Elementale del Cratere: L'Elementale del Cratere infligge 4 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
Formidabile — {2}{R}: L'Elementale del Cratere ha forza base 8 fino alla fine del turno. Attiva questa abilità solo se le creature che controlli hanno una forza totale pari o superiore a 8.

foreignNames.name: 火口の精霊
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, 火口の精霊を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。火口の精霊はそれに４点のダメージを与える。
圧倒 — {2}{R}：ターン終了時まで、火口の精霊の基本のパワーは８になる。この能力は、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーのパワーの合計が８以上であるときにのみ起動できる。

foreignNames.name: 분화구 정령
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, 분화구 정령을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 분화구 정령은 그 목표에 피해 4점을 입힌다.
강대 — {2}{R}: 턴종료까지 분화구 정령의 기본 공격력은 8이 된다. 당신이 조종하는 생물들의 공격력 총합이 8 이상인 경우에만 이 능력을 활성화한다.

foreignNames.name: Elemental da Cratera
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifique Elemental da Cratera: Elemental da Cratera causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
Formidável — {2}{R}: Elemental da Cratera tem 8 de poder básico até o final do turno. Ative esta habilidade somente se as criaturas que você controla tiverem um total de poder igual ou superior a 8.

foreignNames.name: Элементаль Кратера
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, пожертвуйте Элементаля Кратера: Элементаль Кратера наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу.
Внушительность — {2}{R}: Элементаль Кратера имеет базовую силу 8 до конца хода. Активируйте эту способность, только если сумма значений силы существ под вашим контролем равна 8 или больше.

foreignNames.name: Elemental del cráter
foreignNames.text:
{R}, {T}, sacrificar el Elemental del cráter: El Elemental del cráter hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
Formidable — {2}{R}: El Elemental del cráter tiene una fuerza base de 8 hasta el final del turno. Activa esta habilidad solo si las criaturas que controlas tienen una fuerza total de 8 o más.

cards.name: Crater Elemental
cards.originalText:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Crater Elemental: Crater Elemental deals 4 damage to target creature.
Formidable — {2}{R}: Crater Elemental has base power 8 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: Crater Elemental’s last ability overrides all previous effects that set its power to a specific value. Other effects that set its power to a specific value that start to apply after the ability resolves will override this effect.

Effects that modify Crater Elemental’s power, such as the effects of Giant Growth or Hall of Triumph, will apply to it no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for counters that change its power (such as +1/+1 counters) and effects that switch its power and toughness.

If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.text:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Crater Elemental: Crater Elemental deals 4 damage to target creature.
Formidable — {2}{R}: Crater Elemental has base power 8 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

cards.flavor: Dragons emerge from tempests fully formed and terribly hungry.

foreignNames.name: 龙群降临
foreignNames.text: 消灭任意数量的目标生物。每以此法消灭一个生物，其操控者便将一个4/4红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物放进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 龙袭风暴中出现的巨龙不仅有健全体态，更有辘辘饥肠。

foreignNames.name: 龍群降臨
foreignNames.text: 消滅任意數量的目標生物。每以此法消滅一個生物，其操控者便將一個4/4紅色，具飛行異能的龍衍生生物放進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 龍襲風暴中出現的巨龍不僅有健全體態，更有轆轆飢腸。

foreignNames.name: Descente des dragons
foreignNames.text: Détruisez n'importe quel nombre de créatures ciblées. Pour chaque créature détruite de cette manière, son contrôleur met sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 4/4 rouge Dragon avec le vol.
foreignNames.flavor: Les dragons émergent des tempêtes déjà développés et affamés.

foreignNames.name: Anflug der Drachen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen deiner Wahl. Für jede auf diese Weise zerstörte Kreatur bringt ihr Beherrscher einen 4/4 roten Drache-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Stürme bringen Drachen hervor, ausgewachsen und furchtbar hungrig.

foreignNames.name: Discesa dei Draghi
foreignNames.text: Distruggi un qualsiasi numero di creature bersaglio. Per ogni creatura distrutta in questo modo, il suo controllore mette sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Drago 4/4 rossa con volare.
foreignNames.flavor: I draghi emergono dalle tempeste completamente sviluppati e terribilmente affamati.

foreignNames.name: 龍の降下
foreignNames.text: 望む数のクリーチャーを対象とし、それらを破壊する。これにより破壊されたクリーチャー１体につき、そのコントローラーは飛行を持つ赤の４/４のドラゴン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.flavor: 龍は完全な形態で、恐ろしく飢えた状態で大嵐から出現する。

foreignNames.name: 용들의 습격
foreignNames.text: 생물을 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 파괴한다. 이렇게 파괴된 각 생물마다, 그 조종자는 비행을 가진 4/4 적색 용 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 용들은 배고픈 성체로 폭풍에서 태어난다.

foreignNames.name: Descenso dos Dragões
foreignNames.text: Destrua qualquer número de criaturas alvo. Para cada criatura destruída dessa forma, seu controlador coloca no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura vermelha 4/4 do tipo Dragão com voar.
foreignNames.flavor: Os dragões emergem das tempestades em plena forma e com uma fome voraz.

foreignNames.name: Налет Драконов
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте любое количество целевых существ. За каждое существо, уничтоженное таким образом, контролировавший его игрок кладет на поле битвы одну фишку существа 4/4 красный Дракон с Полетом.
foreignNames.flavor: Драконы появляются из бури полностью сформировавшимися и ужасно голодными.

foreignNames.name: Descenso de dragones
foreignNames.text: Destruye cualquier cantidad de criaturas objetivo. Por cada criatura destruida de esta manera, su controlador pone en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Dragón roja 4/4 con la habilidad de volar.
foreignNames.flavor: Los dragones emergen de las tempestades totalmente formados y con un hambre terrible.

cards.name: Descent of the Dragons
cards.originalText: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If a creature is targeted but not destroyed (for example, if it regenerates or has indestructible), it won’t count toward the number of Dragon tokens put onto the battlefield.

cards.text: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: 龙语怒吼
foreignNames.text:
你可以从你手上展示一张龙牌，以作为施放龙语怒吼的额外费用。
龙语怒吼对目标生物造成3点伤害。如果于你施放龙语怒吼时，你展示了龙牌或操控龙，则龙语怒吼对所影响之生物的操控者造成3点伤害。

foreignNames.name: 龍語怒吼
foreignNames.text:
你可以從你手上展示一張龍牌，以作為施放龍語怒吼的額外費用。
龍語怒吼對目標生物造成3點傷害。如果於你施放龍語怒吼時，你展示了龍牌或操控龍，則龍語怒吼對所影響之生物的操控者造成3點傷害。

foreignNames.name: Rugissement draconique
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer le Rugissement draconique, vous pouvez révéler une carte de dragon de votre main.
Le Rugissement draconique inflige 3 blessures à une créature ciblée. Si vous avez révélé une carte de dragon ou si vous contrôliez un dragon au moment où vous avez lancé le Rugissement draconique, le Rugissement draconique inflige 3 blessures au contrôleur de cette créature.

foreignNames.name: Drakonisches Gebrüll
foreignNames.text:
Als zusätzliche Kosten, um Drakonisches Gebrüll zu wirken, kannst du eine Drache-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen.
Drakonisches Gebrüll fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls du eine Drache-Karte offen vorgezeigt hast oder ein Drache unter deiner Kontrolle im Spiel war, sowie du Drakonisches Gebrüll gewirkt hast, fügt Drakonisches Gebrüll dem Beherrscher dieser Kreatur 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignNames.name: Ruggito Draconico
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare il Ruggito Draconico, puoi rivelare una carta Drago dalla tua mano.
Il Ruggito Draconico infligge 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio. Se hai rivelato una carta Drago o controllavi un Drago mentre hai lanciato il Ruggito Draconico, il Ruggito Draconico infligge 3 danni al controllore di quella creatura.

foreignNames.name: 龍詞の咆哮
foreignNames.text:
龍詞の咆哮を唱えるための追加コストとして、あなたの手札にあるドラゴン・カードを１枚公開してもよい。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。龍詞の咆哮はそれに３点のダメージを与える。あなたが龍詞の咆哮を唱えた時点でドラゴン・カードを公開したかドラゴンをコントロールしていたなら、龍詞の咆哮はそのクリーチャーのコントローラーに３点のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: 용의 포효
foreignNames.text:
용의 포효를 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 당신의 손에서 용 카드 한 장을 공개할 수 있다.
생물을 목표로 정한다. 용의 포효는 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다. 용의 포효를 발동하면서 당신이 용 카드를 공개했거나 용을 조종했다면, 용의 포효는 그 생물의 조종자에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.

foreignNames.name: Rugido Dragônico
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar Rugido Dragônico, você pode revelar um card de Dragão da sua mão.
Rugido Dragônico causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo. Se você tiver revelado um card do tipo Dragão ou controlado um Dragão conforme conjurava Rugido Dragônico, Rugido Dragônico causará 3 pontos de dano ao controlador daquela criatura.

foreignNames.name: Драконий Рев
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Драконьего Рева вы можете показать карту Дракона из вашей руки.
Драконий Рев наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу. Если при разыгрывании Драконьего Рева вы показали карту Дракона или контролировали Дракона, Драконий Рев наносит 3 повреждения игроку, контролирующему то существо.

foreignNames.name: Rugido dracónico
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar el Rugido dracónico, puedes mostrar una carta de Dragón de tu mano.
El Rugido dracónico hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. Si mostraste una carta de Dragón o controlabas un Dragón al lanzar el Rugido dracónico, el Rugido dracónico hace 3 puntos de daño al controlador de esa criatura.

cards.name: Draconic Roar
cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Draconic Roar, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Draconic Roar, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

rulings.text: Draconic Roar targets only the creature, not its controller. If that creature becomes an illegal target before Draconic Roar resolves, the spell is countered and none of its effects will occur. No damage is dealt.

If one of these spells is copied, the controller of the copy will get the “Dragon bonus” only if a Dragon card was revealed as an additional cost. The copy wasn’t cast, so whether you controlled a Dragon won’t matter.

You can’t reveal more than one Dragon card to multiply the bonus. There is also no additional benefit for both revealing a Dragon card as an additional cost and controlling a Dragon as you cast the spell.

If you don’t reveal a Dragon card from your hand, you must control a Dragon as you are finished casting the spell to get the bonus. For example, if you lose control of your only Dragon while casting the spell (because, for example, you sacrificed it to activate a mana ability), you won’t get the bonus.

cards.text:

Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Draconic Roar, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.

cards.name: Dragon Whisperer
cards.originalText:
{R}: Dragon Whisperer gains flying until end of turn.
{1}{R}: Dragon Whisperer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Formidable — {4}{R}{R}: Put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.name: Ire Shaman
cards.originalText:
Ire Shaman can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

rulings.text: If a face-down Ire Shaman attacks and is blocked by one creature, turning it face up won’t cause it to become unblocked.
The card exiled with Ire Shaman’s last ability is exiled face up.

Playing the card exiled with Ire Shaman’s last ability follows the normal rules for playing the card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if the card is a creature card, you can cast that card only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
Under normal circumstances, you can play a land card exiled with Ire Shaman only if you haven’t played a land yet that turn.
If you don’t play the card, it will remain exiled.
Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

foreignNames.text: コラガンの野心家がクリーチャー１体にブロックされた状態になるたび、コラガンの野心家はそのクリーチャーに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼女は戦望の呼びかけに応えた。その戦いへの欲望を満たすことができるのは流血だけである。

foreignNames.name: 콜라간 지망생

foreignNames.flavor: 그녀는 피를 봐야만 풀리는 전투욕에 휩싸였다.

foreignNames.name: Aspirante de Kolaghan
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Aspirante de Kolaghan é bloqueado por uma criatura, ele causa 1 ponto de dano àquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Ela atende ao chamado da Sede, o desejo de batalha que só é saciado com o derramamento de sangue.

foreignNames.name: Колаганская Претендентка
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Колаганская Претендентка становится заблокирована существом, Колаганская Претендентка наносит тому существу 1 повреждение.
foreignNames.flavor: Она поддалась зову Жажды, стремления к битве, которое можно утолить лишь кровопролитием.

foreignNames.name: Aspirante de Kólagan
foreignNames.text: Siempre que la Aspirante de Kólagan sea bloqueada por una criatura, la Aspirante de Kólagan hace 1 punto de daño a esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Responde a la llamada del Ansia, ese deseo de guerra que solo se sacia cuando se vierte sangre.

cards.name: Kolaghan Aspirant
cards.originalText: Whenever Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by a creature, Kolaghan Aspirant deals 1 damage to that creature.

rulings.text: If Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by multiple creatures, its ability will trigger once for each of them.

The damage Kolaghan Aspirant deals because of its triggered ability isn’t combat damage. If that damage causes each creature blocking it to leave combat, Kolaghan Aspirant will remain blocked. It won’t be dealt combat damage in this case.

cards.text: Whenever Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by a creature, Kolaghan Aspirant deals 1 damage to that creature.

cards.name: Kolaghan Forerunners
cards.originalText:
Trample
Kolaghan Forerunners's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: The ability that defines Kolaghan Forerunners’s power functions in all zones, not just the battlefield. If Kolaghan Forerunners is on the battlefield, its ability will count itself.

If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Kolaghan Stormsinger
cards.originalText:
Haste
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Kolaghan Stormsinger is turned face up, target creature gains haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.
