cards.name: Lose Calm
cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

rulings.text: Lose Calm can target any creature, including one that’s untapped or one you already control.
Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor:
"Our shamans assert their mastery over the land, thwarting the lesser clans' attempts to stand in the way of our dragonlord."
—Allek, Atarka hunter

foreignNames.name: 岩浆裂谷
foreignNames.text: 不具飞行异能的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我们的祭师完全掌控土地，挫败了低等部落阻挡我们龙王的企图。」
～安塔卡族猎人阿列科

foreignNames.name: 岩漿裂谷
foreignNames.text: 不具飛行異能的生物本回合不能進行阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我們的祭師完全掌控土地，挫敗了低等部落阻擋我們龍王的企圖。」
～安塔卡族獵人阿列科

foreignNames.name: Gorge magmatique
foreignNames.text: Les créatures sans le vol ne peuvent pas bloquer ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Nos shamanes assoient leur autorité sur ces terres, repoussant les tentatives des clans inférieurs de se dresser contre notre seigneur-dragon. »
—Allek, chasseuse d'Atarka

foreignNames.name: Magmaschneise
foreignNames.text: Nichtfliegende Kreaturen können in diesem Zug nicht blocken.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Unsere Schamanen kontrollieren die Erde und machen damit die Pläne der niederen Klane zunichte, die unsere Drachenfürstin bekämpfen."
—Allek, Atarka-Jägerin

foreignNames.name: Baratro di Magma
foreignNames.text: Le creature senza volare non possono bloccare in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"I nostri sciamani impongono il loro dominio sul territorio, sventando i tentativi dei clan minori di ostacolare il nostro signore dei draghi."
—Allek, cacciatrice Atarka

foreignNames.name: 溶岩の地割れ
foreignNames.text: このターン、飛行を持たないクリーチャーではブロックできない。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我々の巫師たちが大地における支配力を確保することで、下賤なる他の氏族が我が龍王に盾突こうとする行為を妨害している。」
——アタルカの狩人、アレク

foreignNames.name: 마그마 협곡
foreignNames.text: 비행이 없는 생물들은 이 턴에 방어할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"우리 주술사들은 용군주님에게 대적하는 하찮은 무리에게 우리 부족의 힘을 보여준다."
—아타르카 사냥꾼 알렉

foreignNames.name: Rifte Magmático
foreignNames.text: As criaturas sem voar não podem bloquear neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nossos xamãs defendem seu domínio sobre a terra, frustrando as tentativas dos clãs inferiores de obstruírem o caminho de nossa soberana dragoa."
— Allek, caçadora de Atarka

foreignNames.name: Магмовая Расселина
foreignNames.text: Существа без Полета не могут блокировать в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Наши шаманы утвердили свою власть над этой землей и пресекли попытки низших кланов встать на пути владычицы драконов».
— Аллек, атаркская охотница

foreignNames.name: Separar el magma
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas sin la habilidad de volar no pueden bloquear este turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nuestros chamanes ejercen su superioridad sobre la tierra. Desbaratan los planes de los clanes inferiores cuando interfieren con los de nuestra señora dragón".
—Álek, cazadora de Atarka

cards.name: Magmatic Chasm
cards.originalText: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

rulings.text: No creature without flying will be able to block that turn, including creatures that lose flying after Magmatic Chasm resolves and creatures without flying that enter the battlefield after Magmatic Chasm resolves.

cards.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

cards.flavor:
"It hunts grand game for Atarka, and when the time comes, it will become a mighty feast."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

foreignNames.name: 黑山贝西摩斯
foreignNames.text: 除非你支付{2}，否则黑山贝西摩斯不能进行攻击或阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor:
「它为安塔卡狩猎大型猎物，而当时机到来，它会变成一顿盛宴。」
～召猎人苏拉克

foreignNames.name: 黑山貝西摩斯
foreignNames.text: 除非你支付{2}，否則黑山貝西摩斯不能進行攻擊或阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor:
「它為安塔卡狩獵大型獵物，而當時機到來，它會變成一頓盛宴。」
～召獵人蘇拉克

foreignNames.name: Béhémoth de Qal Sisma
foreignNames.text: Le Béhémoth de Qal Sisma ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer à moins que vous ne payiez {2}.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Il chasse le plus gros gibier pour Atarka, et deviendra un somptueux festin le moment venu. »
—Surrak, le Grand veneur

foreignNames.name: Qal-Sisma-Behemoth
foreignNames.text: Der Qal-Sisma-Behemoth kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, falls du nicht {2} bezahlst.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Er jagt große Wildtiere für Atarka und wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, wird er selbst ein Festmahl abgeben."
—Surrak der Jagdrufer

foreignNames.name: Behemoth di Qal Sisma
foreignNames.text: Il Behemoth di Qal Sisma non può attaccare o bloccare a meno che tu non paghi {2}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Caccia prede imponenti per Atarka e, quando sarà il momento, diverrà a sua volta un banchetto colossale."
—Surrak, il Convocatore di Caccia

foreignNames.name: カル・シスマのビヒモス
foreignNames.text: カル・シスマのビヒモスは、あなたが{2}を支払わないかぎり、攻撃したりブロックしたりできない。
foreignNames.flavor:
「それはアタルカのために立派な獲物を狩り、そして時が来たとき、それ自身が豪勢なご馳走となる。」
——狩猟の統率者、スーラク

foreignNames.name: 칼 시스마 거대괴수
foreignNames.text: 칼 시스마 거대괴수는 {2}를 지불하지 않는 한 공격하거나 방어할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"녀석은 아타르카 님을 위해 사는 거대한 생물을 사냥하지. 하지만 때가 오면 우리가 녀석을 사냥해 잔치를 벌일거야."
—사냥 대장 서락

foreignNames.name: Behemoth de Qal Sisma
foreignNames.text: Behemoth de Qal Sisma não pode atacar nem bloquear a menos que você pague {2}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ele abate caças grandes para Atarka e, quando chegar a hora, ele mesmo será um grande banquete."
— Surrak, o Convocador da Caçada

foreignNames.name: Чудище из Кэл-Сизма
foreignNames.text: Чудище из Кэл-Сизма не может атаковать или блокировать, если только вы не заплатите {2}.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Он охотится за крупной дичью для Атарки, а когда придет время — сам станет блюдом на пиру».
— Суррак, Созыватель Охоты

foreignNames.name: Behemot de Qal Sisma
foreignNames.text: El Behemot de Qal Sisma no puede atacar ni bloquear a menos que pagues {2}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Caza grandes presas para Atarka y, cuando llegue el momento, él mismo se convertirá en un inmenso festín".
—Surrak, la Voz de la caza

cards.name: Qal Sisma Behemoth
cards.originalText: Qal Sisma Behemoth can't attack or block unless you pay {2}.

rulings.text: If an effect says that Qal Sisma Behemoth must attack or block if able, you can choose not to pay the associated cost and ignore that requirement. Players are never forced to pay a cost to attack or block.

cards.text: Qal Sisma Behemoth can't attack or block unless you pay {2}.

cards.flavor: The sky offers few hiding places.

foreignNames.name: 撕裂齐射
foreignNames.text:
撕裂齐射不能被咒语或异能反击。
撕裂齐射对目标白色或蓝色生物造成4点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 天空毫无遮蔽。

foreignNames.name: 撕裂齊射
foreignNames.text:
撕裂齊射不能被咒語或異能反擊。
撕裂齊射對目標白色或藍色生物造成4點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 天空毫無遮蔽。

foreignNames.name: Volée déchiqueteuse
foreignNames.text:
La Volée déchiqueteuse ne peut pas être contrecarrée par des sorts ou des capacités.
La Volée déchiqueteuse inflige 4 blessures à une créature blanche ou bleue ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Se cacher dans le ciel est souvent impossible.

foreignNames.name: Zerfetzende Salve
foreignNames.text:
Die Zerfetzende Salve kann nicht von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten neutralisiert werden.
Die Zerfetzende Salve fügt einer weißen oder blauen Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Himmel bietet keinerlei Schutz.

foreignNames.name: Raffica Straziante
foreignNames.text:
La Raffica Straziante non può essere neutralizzata da magie o abilità.
La Raffica Straziante infligge 4 danni a una creatura bianca o blu bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Il cielo non offre molti nascondigli.

foreignNames.name: 引き裂く流弾
foreignNames.text:
引き裂く流弾は呪文や能力によっては打ち消されない。
白か青のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。引き裂く流弾はそれに４点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 空に隠れられる場所は少ない。

foreignNames.name: 찢어발기는 일제사격
foreignNames.text:
찢어발기는 일제사격은 주문이나 능력으로 무효화될 수 없다.
백색이나 청색 생물을 목표로 정한다. 찢어발기는 일제사격은 그 목표에 피해 4점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 하늘에는 숨을 곳이 거의 없다.

foreignNames.name: Saraivada Despedaçadora
foreignNames.text:
Saraivada Despedaçadora não pode ser anulada por mágicas ou habilidades.
Saraivada Despedaçadora causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo branca ou azul.
foreignNames.flavor: No céu, não há onde se esconder.

foreignNames.name: Иссекающий Залп
foreignNames.text:
Иссекающий Залп не может быть отменен заклинаниями или способностями.
Иссекающий Залп наносит 4 повреждения целевому белому или синему существу.
foreignNames.flavor: В небе мало мест, где можно спрятаться.

foreignNames.name: Descarga desgarradora
foreignNames.text:
La Descarga desgarradora no puede ser contrarrestada por hechizos o habilidades.
La Descarga desgarradora hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura blanca o azul objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: En el cielo hay pocos lugares donde esconderse.

cards.name: Rending Volley
cards.originalText:
Rending Volley can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.
cards.text:
Rending Volley can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.

cards.flavor:
"Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw."
—Ulnok, Atarka shaman

foreignNames.name: 炙烤
foreignNames.text: 炙烤对目标不具飞行异能的生物造成5点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「安塔卡领地的入侵者只有两个选择：被火焰吞噬，或者被巨嘴吞噬。」
～安塔卡族祭师乌勒诺克

foreignNames.name: 炙烤
foreignNames.text: 炙烤對目標不具飛行異能的生物造成5點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「安塔卡領地的入侵者只有兩個選擇：被火焰吞噬，或者被巨嘴吞噬。」
～安塔卡族祭師烏勒諾克

foreignNames.name: Rôtir
foreignNames.text: Rôtir inflige 5 blessures à une créature sans le vol ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Sur les territoires d'Atarka, les intrus ont le choix : périr par les flammes ou par les crocs. »
—Ulnok, shamane d'Atarka

foreignNames.name: Rösten
foreignNames.text: Rösten fügt einer nichtfliegenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Wer in Atarkas Territorium eindringt, hat die Qual der Wahl: will er lieber vom Feuer verschlungen werden oder von ihrem Schlund?"
—Ulnok, Schamane der Atarka

foreignNames.name: Arrostire
foreignNames.text: Arrostire infligge 5 danni a una creatura bersaglio senza volare.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Gli intrusi nelle terre di Atarka hanno solo due scelte: essere consumati dal fuoco o essere consumati dalle fauci."
—Ulnok, sciamano Atarka

foreignNames.name: 焙り焼き
foreignNames.text: 飛行を持たないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。焙り焼きはそれに５点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor:
「アタルカの領土への侵入者に用意された選択肢は２つである。炎に飲み込まれるか、または口に飲み込まれるかである。」
——アタルカの巫師、ウルナック

foreignNames.name: 굽기
foreignNames.text: 비행이 없는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 굽기는 그 생물에 피해 5점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"아타르카를 침범하는 무리는 불에 타 죽거나 물려죽는다."
—아타르카 주술사 울낙

foreignNames.name: Calcinar
foreignNames.text: Calcinar causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura alvo sem voar.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Os intrusos nas terras de Atarka têm duas opções: serem consumidos pelo fogo ou serem consumidos por mandíbulas afiadas."
— Ulnok, xamã de Atarka

foreignNames.name: Прожарка
foreignNames.text: Прожарка наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу без Полета.
foreignNames.flavor:
«У незваных гостей во владении Атарки есть выбор: попасть в огонь или в пасть дракона».
— Улнок, атаркский шаман

foreignNames.name: Asar
foreignNames.text: Asar hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo sin la habilidad de volar.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los intrusos en las tierras de Atarka no tienen más que dos posibilidades: ser consumidos por el fuego o ser consumidos por mandíbulas".
—Ulnok, chamán de Atarka

cards.name: Roast
cards.originalText: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
cards.text: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.

foreignNames.name: 虎骑前导兵
foreignNames.text:
践踏
强横～每当虎骑前导兵攻击时，若由你操控之生物的力量总和等于或大于8，则虎骑前导兵获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 虎騎前導兵
foreignNames.text:
踐踏
強橫～每當虎騎前導兵攻擊時，若由你操控之生物的力量總和等於或大於8，則虎騎前導兵獲得先攻異能直到回合結束。

foreignNames.name: Cavalier de smilodon
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement
Redoutable — À chaque fois que le Cavalier de smilodon attaque, si les créatures que vous contrôlez ont une force totale supérieure ou égale à 8, le Cavalier de smilodon acquiert l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Säbelzahn-Vorreiter
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Gewaltig — Immer wenn der Säbelzahn-Vorreiter angreift und falls die Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, eine Gesamtstärke von 8 oder mehr haben, erhält der Säbelzahn-Vorreiter Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Battipista della Denti a Sciabola
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere
Formidabile — Ogniqualvolta il Battipista della Denti a Sciabola attacca, se le creature che controlli hanno una forza totale pari o superiore a 8, il Battipista della Denti a Sciabola ha attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 剣歯虎の先導隊
foreignNames.text:
トランプル
圧倒 — 剣歯虎の先導隊が攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーのパワーの合計が８以上である場合、ターン終了時まで剣歯虎の先導隊は先制攻撃を得る。

foreignNames.name: 검치호 선두 기수
foreignNames.text:
돌진
강대 — 검치호 선두 기수가 공격할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 생물들의 공격력 총합이 8 이상이라면, 검치호 선두 기수는 턴종료까지 선제공격을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Vanguardeiro Dente-de-sabre
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar
Formidável — Toda vez que Vanguardeiro Dente-de-sabre ataca, se o total de poder das criaturas que você controla for igual ou superior a 8, Vanguardeiro Dente-de-sabre ganha iniciativa até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Наездник на Саблезубе
foreignNames.text:
Пробивной удар
Внушительность — Каждый раз, когда Наездник на Саблезубе атакует, если сумма значений силы существ под вашим контролем равна 8 или больше, Наездник на Саблезубе получает Первый удар до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: Batidor dientes de sable
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla.
Formidable — Siempre que el Batidor dientes de sable ataque, si las criaturas que controlas tienen una fuerza total de 8 o más, el Batidor dientes de sable gana la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno.

cards.name: Sabertooth Outrider
cards.originalText:
Trample
Formidable — Whenever Sabertooth Outrider attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Sabertooth Outrider gains first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.text:
Trample
Formidable — Whenever Sabertooth Outrider attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Sabertooth Outrider gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

foreignNames.name: 萨坎之怒
foreignNames.text: 萨坎之怒对目标生物或牌手造成5点伤害。如果你未操控龙，则萨坎之怒对你造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 鞑契的人述说着一个古老的传说，一个名叫萨坎的龙人是所有可汗中最伟大的。

foreignNames.name: 薩坎之怒
foreignNames.text: 薩坎之怒對目標生物或玩家造成5點傷害。如果你未操控龍，則薩坎之怒對你造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 韃契的人述說著一個古老的傳說，一個名叫薩坎的龍人是所有可汗中最偉大的。

foreignNames.name: Rage de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: La Rage de Sarkhan inflige 5 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si vous ne contrôlez aucun dragon, la Rage de Sarkhan vous inflige 2 blessures.
foreignNames.flavor: Les habitants de Tarkir racontent une vieille légende, celle d'un homme-dragon nommé Sarkhan, le plus grand de tous les khans.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhans Zorn
foreignNames.text: Sarkhans Zorn fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls du keinen Drachen kontrollierst, fügt dir Sarkhans Zorn 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Völker Tarkirs kennen eine alte Legende über einen Drachenmenschen namens Sarkhan, dem größten aller Khane.

foreignNames.name: Furia di Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: La Furia di Sarkhan infligge 5 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Se non controlli Draghi, la Furia di Sarkhan ti infligge 2 danni.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli abitanti di Tarkir narrano di un'antica leggenda: un uomo-drago chiamato Sarkhan che era il più grande di tutti i khan.

foreignNames.name: サルカンの怒り
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。サルカンの怒りはそれに５点のダメージを与える。あなたがドラゴンをコントロールしていないなら、サルカンの怒りはあなたに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: タルキールの人々の間では、最も偉大なカンであった龍人のサルカンという者を太古の伝説として語り継いでいる。

foreignNames.name: 사르칸의 분노
foreignNames.text: 생물 또는 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 사르칸의 분노는 그 목표에 피해 5점을 입힌다. 당신이 용을 조종하는 않는다면, 사르칸의 분노는 당신에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 타르커 사람들에게는 칸중의 칸, 반인반용 사르칸의 전설이 널리 퍼져있다.

foreignNames.name: Fúria de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: Fúria de Sarkhan causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Se você não controlar nenhum Dragão, Fúria de Sarkhan causará 2 pontos de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: O povo de Tarkir fala de uma antiga lenda: o homem-dragão chamado Sarkhan que fora o maior dos khans.

foreignNames.name: Ярость Сархана
foreignNames.text: Ярость Сархана наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу или игроку. Если под вашим контролем нет Драконов, Ярость Сархана наносит 2 повреждения вам.
foreignNames.flavor: На Таркире есть древняя легенда о драконочеловеке Сархане, который был величайшим из всех ханов.

foreignNames.name: Furia de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: La Furia de Sarkhan hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Si no controlas ningún Dragón, la Furia de Sarkhan te hace 2 puntos de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: En Tarkir se cuenta una antigua leyenda sobre un hombre dragón llamado Sarkhan, que fue el más grande de todos los kans.

cards.name: Sarkhan's Rage
cards.originalText: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to target creature or player. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

rulings.text: Sarkhan’s Rage checks whether you control a Dragon as it resolves.

cards.text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to target creature or player. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

cards.flavor: Sarkhan gazed on the world around him, the dragons sweeping through its skies, and joy kindled like a fire in his soul.

foreignNames.name: 萨坎凯旋
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张龙生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 萨坎注视着他周围的世界，巨龙横扫天空，他灵魂中激起了如火焰般的喜悦。

foreignNames.name: 薩坎凱旋
foreignNames.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張龍生物牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 薩坎注視著他周圍的世界，巨龍橫掃天空，他靈魂中激起了如火焰般的喜悅。

foreignNames.name: Triomphe de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de créature Dragon, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Sarkhan sentit la joie embraser son âme tandis qu'il contemplait le monde qui l'entourait et le ciel empli de dragons.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhans Triumph
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Drache-Kreaturenkarte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Sarkhan betrachtete die Welt um sich herum, sah die Drachen über die Himmel jagen, und seine Seele brannte vor Freude wie Feuer.

foreignNames.name: Trionfo di Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta creatura Drago, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Lo sguardo di Sarkhan si posò sul mondo intorno a lui, mentre i draghi volteggiavano nel cielo, e la gioia divampò come una fiamma nel suo cuore.

foreignNames.name: サルカンの凱旋
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーからドラゴン・クリーチャー・カードを１枚探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: サルカンは空に龍が飛び回っている自分の周りの世界を見渡した。彼の心の中に炎のように熱い喜悦が広がっていった。

foreignNames.name: 사르칸의 승리
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고에서 용 생물 카드를 찾아 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그런 다음 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 사르칸은 용이 날아다니는 모습을 바라보며 희열에 가득찼다.

foreignNames.name: Triunfo de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: Procure um card de criatura do tipo Dragão em seu grimório, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e, depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Sarkhan contemplou o mundo ao seu redor, os dragões voando alto no céu, e a chama da felicidade ardeu na sua alma.

foreignNames.name: Триумф Сархана
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту существа-Дракона, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Сархан смотрел на мир вокруг него, на драконов, кружащих в небесах, и ликование пламенем разгоралось в его душе.

foreignNames.name: Triunfo de Sarkhan
foreignNames.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de criatura Dragón, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Sarkhan contempló el mundo a su alrededor, a los dragones que surcaban los cielos, y la alegría se encendió como una llama en su corazón.

cards.name: Screamreach Brawler
cards.originalText: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Sprinting Warbrute
cards.originalText:
Sprinting Warbrute attacks each turn if able.
Dash {3}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: You still choose which player or planeswalker Sprinting Warbrute attacks.

If, during your declare attackers step, Sprinting Warbrute is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under your control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature attack, you’re not forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Volcanic Rush
cards.originalText: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker that combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left the battlefield.
Even though Volcanic Rush affects only attacking creatures, the bonus will remain for the rest of the turn.
Only creatures that are attacking as Volcanic Rush resolves will receive the bonus. In other words, casting it before you declare attackers usually won’t do anything.

cards.name: Volcanic Vision
cards.originalText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

rulings.text: If the target instant or sorcery card becomes an illegal target before Volcanic Vision resolves, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. No damage will be dealt and Volcanic Vision won’t be exiled.
If the target has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If the target is a split card, damage will be dealt only once to each creature your opponents control. The damage will be equal to the sum of the card’s two converted mana costs.

cards.name: Warbringer
cards.originalText:
Dash costs you pay cost {2} less (as long as this creature is on the battlefield).
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: Warbringer’s first ability doesn’t affect Warbringer itself.
Warbringer’s first ability can’t affect the colored mana requirement of a dash cost. If a card’s dash cost includes one generic mana, that cost will be reduced by {1}.

If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

rulings.text: Once Zurgo Bellstriker has legally blocked a creature, raising that creature’s power to 2 or greater won’t undo the block.
Even though both cards portray the same character, Zurgo Bellstriker and Zurgo Helmsmasher have different names. Controlling both of them won’t invoke the “legend rule.”

If you choose to pay the dash cost rather than the mana cost, you’re still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its dash cost only when you otherwise could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the dash cost to cast a creature spell, that card will be returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s still on the battlefield when its triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don’t have to attack with the creature with dash unless another ability says you do.
If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose dash cost was paid, the copy won’t have haste and won’t be returned to its owner’s hand.

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Ainok Survivalist
cards.originalText:
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Assault Formation
cards.originalText:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
{G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
{2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: For example, a 2/3 creature will assign 3 combat damage rather than 2.

The first ability doesn’t actually change any creature’s power. It changes only the value of the combat damage it assigns. All other rules and effects that check power or toughness use the real values.

cards.name: Atarka Beastbreaker
cards.originalText: Formidable — {4}{G}: Atarka Beastbreaker gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 여섯 장을 본다. 그 카드들 중에서 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 생물 카드를 최대 두 장까지 전장에 놓는다. 나머지 카드들은 당신이 원하는 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 혼자서 불가능하다면 여럿으로 버틸 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Companhia Agrupada
foreignNames.text: Olhe os seis cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque até dois cards de criatura com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3 dentre eles no campo de batalha. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.
foreignNames.flavor: A cada vaga imprevista seguem-se muitos candidatos.

foreignNames.name: Сборная Рота
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите шесть верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Положите из них на поле битвы не более двух карт существ с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 3 или меньше. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.
foreignNames.flavor: Там, где падет один, выстоят многие.

foreignNames.name: Compañía reunida
foreignNames.text: Mira las seis primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon en el campo de batalla hasta dos cartas de criatura que se encuentren entre ellas con coste de maná convertido de 3 o menos. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.
foreignNames.flavor: Muchos pueden resistir donde uno solo caería.

cards.name: Collected Company
cards.originalText: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: Each of the creature cards can have converted mana cost 3 or less. It’s not the total converted mana cost of the two cards.

cards.flavor: The colossodon's hard outer shell stops many predators, but with a gentle flip from a dragon, it quickly becomes a meal in a bowl.

foreignNames.name: 初年硕齿兽
foreignNames.flavor: 硕齿兽的坚硬外壳阻挡了许多掠食者，但巨龙只需轻轻一翻，就能把他变成盘中美餐。

foreignNames.name: 初年碩齒獸

foreignNames.name: Jeune colossodon

foreignNames.name: Kolossodon-Jährling
foreignNames.flavor: Der Panzer des Kolossodons hält viele Raubtiere ab, aber sobald ihn ein Drache auf den Rücken dreht, wird er zum Fressnapf.

foreignNames.name: Cucciolo di Colossodonte
foreignNames.flavor: Il duro guscio esterno del colossodonte ferma molti predatori, ma, se rovesciato facilmente da un drago, diviene una scodella per il suo pasto.

foreignNames.name: コロッソドンの一年仔
foreignNames.flavor: コロッソドンの堅固な外殻は多くの捕食者から身を守ってくれるが、龍が軽く弾くだけで餌を盛った鉢となる。

foreignNames.name: 일년생 콜로소돈
foreignNames.flavor: 콜로소돈은 단단한 외피 덕분에 많은 포식자를 피할 수 있다. 하지만 용이 살짝 뒤집으면 이 외피가 좋은 그릇이 되어 준다.

foreignNames.name: Colossodonte Neonato

foreignNames.name: Годовалый Колоссодонт

foreignNames.name: Cría de colosodón
foreignNames.flavor: El duro caparazón del colosodón es capaz de detener a muchos depredadores, pero basta conque un dragón le dé la vuelta para convertirse en comida servida en un cuenco.

cards.name: Deathmist Raptor
cards.originalText:
Deathtouch
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you may return Deathmist Raptor from your graveyard to the battlefield face up or face down.
Megamorph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: Deathmist Raptor’s second ability triggers only if Deathmist Raptor is in the graveyard when a permanent you control is turned face up.
You choose whether Deathmist Raptor will enter the battlefield face up or face down as the ability resolves. You may also choose to leave it in the graveyard.
Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Den Protector
cards.originalText:
Creatures with power less than Den Protector's power can't block it.

rulings.text: You compare Den Protector’s power to the power of any creature trying to block it only as blockers are assigned. Once Den Protector has been legally blocked by a creature, changing the power of either creature won’t change or undo the block.
Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Display of Dominance
cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Destroy target blue or black noncreature permanent.
• Permanents you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells your opponents control this turn.

rulings.text: If you choose the second mode, and if a permanent you control is being targeted by a spell when Display of Dominance resolves, nothing happens right away. When that spell would resolve, its color is checked. If it’s blue or black, that permanent will be an illegal target for that spell and won’t be affected by it. If all that spell’s targets have become illegal by the time it would resolve, it’s countered.
If you choose the second mode, no new blue or black spell may be cast by an opponent that turn targeting a permanent you control after Display of Dominance resolves.

If you choose the second mode, Display of Dominance will affect any permanent you happen to control at any point during the rest of the turn, not just permanents you control as it resolves. That’s because it doesn’t grant an ability to those permanents; rather, it affects the game rules and states something that’s now true about those permanents.
Keep in mind that an Aura spell targets the permanent it will enchant (but an Aura on the battlefield doesn’t target the permanent it’s attached to).
Permanents you control may be the targets of abilities from blue or black sources controlled by your opponents.

cards.name: Dragon-Scarred Bear
cards.originalText: Formidable — {1}{G}: Regenerate Dragon-Scarred Bear. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.originalText: Bolster 4. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulings.text: Bolster itself doesn’t target any creature, though some spells and abilities that bolster may have other effects that target creatures. For example, you could put counters on a creature with protection from white with Aven Tactician’s bolster ability.

You determine which creature to put counters on as the spell or ability that instructs you to bolster resolves. That could be the creature with the bolster ability, if it’s still under your control and has the least toughness.

あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体が格闘を行うたび、次の終了ステップの開始時に、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを２個置く。

foreignNames.name: 적을 파괴하는 섭정
foreignNames.text:
비행
적을 파괴하는 섭정이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하지 않는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 적을 파괴하는 섭정과 그 생물이 싸우도록 할 수 있다.
당신이 조종하는 생물이 싸울 때마다, 다음 종료단 시작에 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 올려놓는다.

Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla lutar, coloque dois marcadores +1/+1 nela no início da próxima etapa final.

Каждый раз, когда существо под вашим контролем дерется, положите на него два жетона +1/+1 в начале следующего заключительного шага.

cards.name: Foe-Razer Regent
cards.originalText:
Flying
When Foe-Razer Regent enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.
Whenever a creature you control fights, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: You choose the target of the first triggered ability as it goes on the stack, but you choose whether or not to fight as that ability resolves.
If the target creature you don’t control becomes an illegal target of the first triggered ability before it resolves, Foe-Razer Regent won’t fight and its last ability won’t trigger.
If a creature you control fights during an end step, the delayed triggered ability that puts +1/+1 counters on that creature won’t trigger until the beginning of the following turn’s end step.

cards.name: Glade Watcher
cards.originalText:
Defender
Formidable — {G}: Glade Watcher can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.name: Lurking Arynx
cards.originalText: Formidable — {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Lurking Arynx this turn if able. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: You may activate Lurking Arynx’s ability multiple times in a turn to force multiple creatures to block it if able.
Activating Lurking Arynx’s ability doesn’t force you to attack with it that turn. If it doesn’t attack, the creatures affected by its ability can block other attacking creatures or not block at all.
If a creature affected by Lurking Arynx’s ability can’t legally block it (perhaps because Lurking Arynx has gained flying), that creature can block other attacking creatures or not block at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, a creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to block in that case either.

If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.name: Pinion Feast
cards.originalText: Destroy target creature with flying. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulings.text: You must choose a creature with flying in order to cast Pinion Feast. You can’t cast it without a legal target just to bolster.

Bolster itself doesn’t target any creature, though some spells and abilities that bolster may have other effects that target creatures. For example, you could put counters on a creature with protection from white with Aven Tactician’s bolster ability.

You determine which creature to put counters on as the spell or ability that instructs you to bolster resolves. That could be the creature with the bolster ability, if it’s still under your control and has the least toughness.

cards.name: Salt Road Ambushers
cards.originalText:
Whenever another permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Megamorph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: The face-down permanent must be a creature both before it’s turned face up and when the triggered ability resolves to have +1/+1 counters placed on it.
Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Sandsteppe Scavenger
cards.originalText: When Sandsteppe Scavenger enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulings.text: Bolster itself doesn’t target any creature, though some spells and abilities that bolster may have other effects that target creatures. For example, you could put counters on a creature with protection from white with Aven Tactician’s bolster ability.

You determine which creature to put counters on as the spell or ability that instructs you to bolster resolves. That could be the creature with the bolster ability, if it’s still under your control and has the least toughness.

cards.name: Scaleguard Sentinels
cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Scaleguard Sentinels, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Scaleguard Sentinels enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Scaleguard Sentinels.

rulings.text: If one of these spells is copied, the controller of the copy will get the “Dragon bonus” only if a Dragon card was revealed as an additional cost. The copy wasn’t cast, so whether you controlled a Dragon won’t matter.

You can’t reveal more than one Dragon card to multiply the bonus. There is also no additional benefit for both revealing a Dragon card as an additional cost and controlling a Dragon as you cast the spell.

If you don’t reveal a Dragon card from your hand, you must control a Dragon as you are finished casting the spell to get the bonus. For example, if you lose control of your only Dragon while casting the spell (because, for example, you sacrificed it to activate a mana ability), you won’t get the bonus.

cards.originalText: Megamorph {6}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: Turning a face-down creature with megamorph face up and putting a +1/+1 counter on it is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

If a face-down creature with megamorph is turned face up some other way (for example, if you manifest a card with megamorph and then pay its mana cost to turn it face up), you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Megamorph is a variant of the morph ability. You can find more information on morph on cards with morph from the Khans of Tarkir set.

cards.name: Shaman of Forgotten Ways
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Formidable — {9}{G}{G}, {T}: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

rulings.text: The first ability of Shaman of Forgotten Ways is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
The mana produced by Shaman of Forgotten Ways can be used to cast face-down creature spells with morph or megamorph.
Count the number of creatures each player controls when the last ability resolves to determine what number each player’s life total will become.

For a player’s life total to become a specific number, the player gains or loses the appropriate amount of life. For example, if a player’s life total is 12 and that player controls three creatures as the ability resolves, he or she will lose 9 life. Other effects that interact with life gain or loss will interact with this effect accordingly.

If a player controls no creatures as the last ability resolves, his or her life total will become 0, causing that player to lose the game. If all players’ life totals become 0 this way, the game will be a draw.

If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.name: Stampeding Elk Herd
cards.originalText: Formidable — Whenever Stampeding Elk Herd attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: If you control a creature with power less than 0, use its actual power when calculating the total power of creatures you control. For example, if you control three creatures with powers 4, 5, and -2, the total power of creatures you control is 7.

Some formidable abilities are activated abilities that require creatures you control to have total power 8 or greater. Once you activate these abilities, it doesn’t matter what happens to the total power of creatures you control.

Other formidable abilities are triggered abilities with an “intervening ‘if’” clause. Such abilities check the total power of creatures you control twice: once at the appropriate time to see if the ability will trigger, and again as the ability tries to resolve. If, at that time, the total power of creatures you control is no longer 8 or greater, the ability will have no effect.

cards.originalText: Bolster X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn. (To bolster X, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put X +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulings.text: Count the number of cards in your hand as Sunbringer’s Touch resolves to determine the value of X.

Bolster itself doesn’t target any creature, though some spells and abilities that bolster may have other effects that target creatures. For example, you could put counters on a creature with protection from white with Aven Tactician’s bolster ability.

You determine which creature to put counters on as the spell or ability that instructs you to bolster resolves. That could be the creature with the bolster ability, if it’s still under your control and has the least toughness.

cards.name: Arashin Sovereign
cards.originalText:
Flying
When Arashin Sovereign dies, you may put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.

rulings.text: The player who controlled Arashin Sovereign when it died chooses whether to put it on the top or bottom of its owner’s library. The player may also choose to leave Arashin Sovereign in the graveyard. This choice is made as the ability resolves.

Arashin Sovereign will be put on the top or bottom of that library only if it’s still in the graveyard when its ability resolves. If it leaves the graveyard before that point, it will stay in whatever zone it’s in, even if it’s returned to the graveyard before the ability resolves.

cards.name: Atarka's Command
cards.originalText:
Choose two —
• Your opponents can't gain life this turn.
• Atarka's Command deals 3 damage to each opponent.
• You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain reach until end of turn.

rulings.text: You choose the two modes as you cast the spell. You must choose two different modes. Once modes are chosen, they can’t be changed.

You can choose a mode only if you can choose legal targets for that mode. Ignore the targeting requirements for modes that aren’t chosen. For example, you can cast Ojutai’s Command without targeting a creature spell provided you don’t choose the third mode.

As the spell resolves, follow the instructions of the modes you chose in the order they are printed on the card. For example, if you chose the second and fourth modes of Ojutai’s Command, you would gain 4 life and then draw a card. (The order won’t matter in most cases.)
If a Command is copied, the effect that creates the copy will usually allow you to choose new targets for the copy, but you can’t choose new modes.

If all targets for the chosen modes become illegal before the Command resolves, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. If at least one target is still legal, the spell will resolve but will have no effect on any illegal targets.

foreignNames.name: 龙王寇安甘
foreignNames.text:
飞行，敏捷
由你操控的其他生物具有敏捷异能。
每当任一对手施放与其坟墓场中任一张牌同名的生物或鹏洛客咒语时，该牌手失去10点生命。

foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: Kolaghan, seigneur-dragon
foreignNames.text:
Vol, célérité
Les autres créatures que vous contrôlez ont la célérité.
À chaque fois qu'un adversaire lance un sort de créature ou de planeswalker ayant le même nom qu'une carte de son cimetière, ce joueur perd 10 points de vie.

foreignNames.name: Drachenfürstin Kolaghan
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend, Eile
Andere Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Eile.
Immer wenn ein Gegner einen Kreaturen- oder Planeswalker-Zauberspruch mit demselben Namen wie eine Karte in seinem Friedhof wirkt, verliert dieser Spieler 10 Lebenspunkte.

foreignNames.name: Signore dei Draghi Kolaghan

Le altre creature che controlli hanno rapidità.
Ogniqualvolta un avversario lancia una magia creatura o planeswalker con lo stesso nome di una carta nel suo cimitero, quel giocatore perde 10 punti vita.

foreignNames.name: 龍王コラガン
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: 용군주 콜라간
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: Kolaghan, Soberana Dragoa
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: Владычица Драконов Колаган

foreignNames.name: Kólagan, señora dragón

cards.name: Dragonlord Kolaghan
cards.originalText:
Flying, haste
Other creatures you control have haste.
Whenever an opponent casts a creature or planeswalker spell with the same name as a card in his or her graveyard, that player loses 10 life.

rulings.text: Casting a spell face down won’t cause Dragonlord Kolaghan’s last ability to trigger. A spell with no name can’t have the same name as any other card.
If an opponent casts a creature spell with delve and exiles all cards from his or her graveyard with the same name to help pay its cost, Dragonlord Kolaghan’s ability won’t trigger.

cards.text:

foreignNames.name: 龙王欧祝泰
foreignNames.text:
飞行
只要龙王欧祝泰未横置，它便具有辟邪异能。
每当龙王欧祝泰对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

foreignNames.name: 龍王歐祝泰
foreignNames.text:
飛行
只要龍王歐祝泰未橫置，它便具有辟邪異能。

foreignNames.name: Ojutaï, seigneur-dragon
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Ojutaï, seigneur-dragon a la défense talismanique tant qu'il est dégagé.
À chaque fois qu'Ojutaï, seigneur-dragon inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'elles dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignNames.name: Drachenfürst Ojutai
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Drachenfürst Ojutai hat Fluchsicherheit, solange er ungetappt ist.
Immer wenn Drachenfürst Ojutai einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Signore dei Draghi Ojutai
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Il Signore dei Draghi Ojutai ha anti-malocchio fintanto che è STAPpato.
Ogniqualvolta il Signore dei Draghi Ojutai infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi una di quelle carte alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: 龍王オジュタイ
foreignNames.text:
飛行
龍王オジュタイがアンタップ状態であるかぎり、これは呪禁を持つ。
龍王オジュタイがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に加え、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: 용군주 오주타이
foreignNames.text:
비행
용군주 오주타이는 언탭되어 있는 한 방호를 가진다.
용군주 오주타이가 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 본다. 그중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 원하는 순서로 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Ojutai, Soberano Dragão
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Ojutai, Soberano Dragão, terá resistência a magia enquanto estiver desvirado.
Toda vez que Ojutai, Soberano Dragão, causar dano de combate a um jogador, olhe os três cards do topo do seu grimório. Coloque um deles na sua mão e os restantes no fundo do seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Владыка Драконов Оджутай
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Владыка Драконов Оджутай имеет Порчеустойчивость, пока он развернут.
Каждый раз, когда Владыка Драконов Оджутай наносит боевые повреждения игроку, посмотрите три верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из них в вашу руку, а остальные — в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

foreignNames.name: Ójutai, señor dragón
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Ójutai, señor dragón tiene la habilidad de antimaleficio mientras esté enderezado.
Siempre que Ójutai, señor dragón haga daño de combate a un jugador, mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

cards.name: Dragonlord Ojutai
cards.originalText:
Flying
Dragonlord Ojutai has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
Whenever Dragonlord Ojutai deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

foreignNames.flavor: シルムガルは自らの豪奢さをさらに高める機会を逃さない。

용군주 실룸가르가 전장에 들어올 때, 생물이나 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 당신이 용군주 실룸가르를 조종하는 한, 당신은 그 목표의 조종권을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Silumgar, Soberano Dragão
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.flavor: Силумгар никогда не упускает возможность пополнить свои богатства.

foreignNames.name: Sílumgar, señor dragón
foreignNames.text:
Vuela, toque mortal.
Cuando Sílumgar, señor dragón entre al campo de batalla, gana el control de la criatura o planeswalker objetivo mientras controles a Sílumgar, señor dragón.
foreignNames.flavor: Sílumgar nunca deja pasar una oportunidad de aumentar sus riquezas.

cards.name: Dragonlord Silumgar
cards.originalText:
Flying, deathtouch
When Dragonlord Silumgar enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Dragonlord Silumgar.

rulings.text: If Dragonlord Silumgar leaves the battlefield, you no longer control it, and its control-change effect ends.
If Dragonlord Silumgar ceases to be under your control before its ability resolves, you won’t gain control of the creature or planeswalker at all.
If another player gains control of Dragonlord Silumgar, its control-change effect ends. Regaining control of Dragonlord Silumgar won’t cause you to regain control of the creature or planeswalker.

cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Dragonlord Silumgar enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Dragonlord Silumgar.

foreignNames.name: 卓茉卡的指命
foreignNames.text:
选择两项～
• 于本回合中，防止目标瞬间或法术咒语将造成的所有伤害。
• 目标牌手牺牲一个结界。
• 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。
• 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。

foreignNames.name: 卓茉卡的指命
foreignNames.text:
選擇兩項～
•於本回合中，防止目標瞬間或巫術咒語將造成的所有傷害。
•目標玩家犧牲一個結界。
•在目標生物上放置一個+1/+1指示物。
•目標由你操控的生物與目標不由你操控的生物互鬥。

foreignNames.name: Commandement de Dromoka
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez deux — 
• Prévenez toutes les blessures que le sort d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblé pourrait infliger ce tour-ci.
• Le joueur ciblé sacrifie un enchantement.
• Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur la créature ciblée.
• Une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez se bat contre une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas.

foreignNames.name: Dromokas Befehl
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme zwei —
• Verhindere allen Schaden, den ein Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei deiner Wahl in diesem Zug zufügen würde.
• Ein Spieler deiner Wahl opfert eine Verzauberung.
• Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
• Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, kämpft gegen eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst.

foreignNames.name: Comando di Dromoka
foreignNames.text:
Scegli due —
• Previeni tutto il danno che una magia istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio infliggerebbe in questo turno.
• Un giocatore bersaglio sacrifica un incantesimo.
• Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio.
• Una creatura bersaglio che controlli lotta con una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.

foreignNames.name: ドロモカの命令
foreignNames.text:
以下から２つを選ぶ。
・インスタント・呪文１つかソーサリー・呪文１つを対象とする。このターン、それが与えるすべてのダメージを軽減する。
・プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはエンチャントを１つ生け贄に捧げる。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。
・あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体とあなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。

foreignNames.name: 드로모카의 명령
foreignNames.text:
둘을 선택한다 —
• 순간마법이나 집중마법 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문이 이번 턴에 입히려는 모든 피해를 방지한다.
• 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 부여마법 한 개를 희생한다.
• 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
• 당신이 조종하는 생물과 당신이 조종하지 않는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 두 생물은 서로 싸운다.

foreignNames.name: Comando de Dromoka
foreignNames.text:
Escolha dois —
• Previna todo o dano que a mágica instantânea ou o feitiço alvo causaria neste turno.
• O jogador alvo sacrifica um encantamento.
• Coloque um marcador +1/+1 na criatura alvo.
• A criatura alvo que você controla luta com a criatura alvo que você não controla.

foreignNames.name: Веление Дромоки
foreignNames.text:
Выберите два —
• Предотвратите все повреждения, которые целевое мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства должно нанести в этом ходу.
• Целевой игрок жертвует чары.
• Положите один жетон +1/+1 на целевое существо.
• Целевое существо под вашим контролем дерется с целевым существом не под вашим контролем.

foreignNames.name: Mandato de Drómoka
foreignNames.text:
Elige dos:
• Prevén todo el daño que fuera a hacer el hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro este turno.
• El jugador objetivo sacrifica un encantamiento.
• Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo.
• La criatura objetivo que controlas lucha contra la criatura objetivo que no controlas.

cards.name: Dromoka's Command
cards.originalText:
Choose two —
• Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn.
• Target player sacrifices an enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: You choose the two modes as you cast the spell. You must choose two different modes. Once modes are chosen, they can’t be changed.

You can choose a mode only if you can choose legal targets for that mode. Ignore the targeting requirements for modes that aren’t chosen. For example, you can cast Ojutai’s Command without targeting a creature spell provided you don’t choose the third mode.

As the spell resolves, follow the instructions of the modes you chose in the order they are printed on the card. For example, if you chose the second and fourth modes of Ojutai’s Command, you would gain 4 life and then draw a card. (The order won’t matter in most cases.)
If a Command is copied, the effect that creates the copy will usually allow you to choose new targets for the copy, but you can’t choose new modes.

If all targets for the chosen modes become illegal before the Command resolves, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. If at least one target is still legal, the spell will resolve but will have no effect on any illegal targets.

Flying
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

rulings.text: A creature entering the battlefield with one or more +1/+1 counters on it will cause Enduring Scalelord’s ability to trigger.
If +1/+1 counters are put on multiple creatures you control (other than Enduring Scalelord) at the same time, Enduring Scalelord’s ability will trigger once for each of those creatures.

If you control two Enduring Scalelords, putting a +1/+1 counter on one of them will cause the ability of the other one to trigger. When this ability resolves, you’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the other Scalelord. This will cause the ability of the first one to trigger. This loop will repeat until you choose not to put a +1/+1 counter on one of the Enduring Scalelords.
