foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn der Nekromeisterdrache einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du {2} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel und jeder Gegner legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignNames.name: Drago Signore Necromante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta il Drago Signore Necromante infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, puoi pagare {2}. Se lo fai, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera e ogni avversario mette nel proprio cimitero le prime due carte del proprio grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 屍術使いのドラゴン
foreignNames.text:
飛行
屍術使いのドラゴンがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたは{2}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、あなたは黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出し、各対戦相手はそれぞれ自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。

foreignNames.name: 망자들을 지배하는 용
foreignNames.text:
비행
망자들을 지배하는 용이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 당신은 {2}를 지불할 수 있다. 당신이 그렇게 한다면, 2/2 흑색 좀비 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓고 각 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignNames.name: Dragoa Necromestra
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Dragoa Necromestra causa dano de combate a um jogador, você pode pagar {2}. Se fizer isso, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi, e cada oponente coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreignNames.name: Дракон-Некромастер
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда Дракон-Некромастер наносит боевые повреждения игроку, вы можете заплатить {2}. Если вы это делаете, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби, и каждый оппонент кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignNames.name: Dragona nigromaestra
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que la Dragona nigromaestra haga daño de combate a un jugador, puedes pagar {2}. Si lo haces, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2 y cada oponente pone las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

cards.name: Necromaster Dragon
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Necromaster Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield and each opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: Necromaster Dragon’s last ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. For each of these abilities, you may pay {2} only once.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Necromaster Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield and each opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

foreignNames.name: 欧祝泰的指命
foreignNames.text:
选择两项～
• 将目标总法术力费用等于或小于2的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。
• 你获得4点生命。
• 反击目标生物咒语。
• 抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 歐祝泰的指命
foreignNames.text:
選擇兩項～
•將目標總魔法力費用等於或小於2的生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。
•你獲得4點生命。
•反擊目標生物咒語。
•抽一張牌。

foreignNames.name: Commandement d'Ojutaï
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez deux — 
• Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière une carte de créature ciblée avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à 2.
• Vous gagnez 4 points de vie.
• Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé.
• Piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Ojutais Befehl
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme zwei —
• Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 2 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
• Du erhältst 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
• Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl.
• Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignNames.name: Comando di Ojutai
foreignNames.text:
Scegli due —
• Rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 2 dal tuo cimitero.
• Guadagni 4 punti vita.
• Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio.
• Pesca una carta.

foreignNames.name: オジュタイの命令
foreignNames.text:
以下から２つを選ぶ。
・あなたの墓地にある点数で見たマナ・コストが２以下のクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを戦場に戻す。
・あなたは４点のライフを得る。
・クリーチャー・呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
・カードを１枚引く。

foreignNames.name: 오주타이의 명령
foreignNames.text:
둘을 선택한다 —
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 2 이하인 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.
• 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.
• 생물 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
• 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Comando de Ojutai
foreignNames.text:
Escolha dois —
• Devolva o card de criatura alvo com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 2 do seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.
• Você ganha 4 pontos de vida.
• Anule a mágica de criatura alvo.
• Compre um card.

foreignNames.name: Веление Оджутая
foreignNames.text:
Выберите два —
• Верните целевую карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 2 из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.
• Вы получаете 4 жизни.
• Отмените целевое заклинание существа.
• Возьмите карту.

foreignNames.name: Mandato de Ójutai
foreignNames.text:
Elige dos:
• Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo con coste de maná convertido de 2 o menos de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.
• Ganas 4 vidas.
• Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo de criatura.
• Roba una carta.

cards.name: Ojutai's Command
cards.originalText:
Choose two —
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• You gain 4 life.
• Counter target creature spell.
• Draw a card.

rulings.text: You choose the two modes as you cast the spell. You must choose two different modes. Once modes are chosen, they can’t be changed.

You can choose a mode only if you can choose legal targets for that mode. Ignore the targeting requirements for modes that aren’t chosen. For example, you can cast Ojutai’s Command without targeting a creature spell provided you don’t choose the third mode.

As the spell resolves, follow the instructions of the modes you chose in the order they are printed on the card. For example, if you chose the second and fourth modes of Ojutai’s Command, you would gain 4 life and then draw a card. (The order won’t matter in most cases.)
If a Command is copied, the effect that creates the copy will usually allow you to choose new targets for the copy, but you can’t choose new modes.

If all targets for the chosen modes become illegal before the Command resolves, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. If at least one target is still legal, the spell will resolve but will have no effect on any illegal targets.

cards.text:
Choose two —
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• You gain 4 life.
• Counter target creature spell.
• Draw a card.

cards.flavor: The elite of Ojutai's brood, the skywise see their enemies as puzzles to be solved.

foreignNames.name: 净穹慧龙
foreignNames.text:
飞行
每当你施放非生物咒语时，重置净穹慧龙。选择一种颜色。净穹慧龙获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 欧祝泰一脉的精英龙群冠穹慧之名，将一切敌人均看作待解之谜。

foreignNames.name: 淨穹慧龍
foreignNames.text:
飛行
每當你施放非生物咒語時，重置淨穹慧龍。選擇一種顏色。淨穹慧龍獲得反該色保護異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 歐祝泰一脈的精英龍群冠穹慧之名，將一切敵人均看作待解之謎。

foreignNames.name: Sage céleste immaculée
foreignNames.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort non-créature, dégagez la Sage céleste immaculée. Elle acquiert la protection contre la couleur de votre choix jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Élites de la couvée d'Ojutaï, les sages célestes considèrent leurs ennemis comme des énigmes à résoudre.

foreignNames.name: Makellose Himmelsweise
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn du einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch wirkst, enttappe die Makellose Himmelsweise. Sie erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges Schutz vor einer Farbe, die du bestimmst.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Elite von Ojutais Brut betrachtet ihre Feinde als Rätsel, das es zu knacken gilt.

foreignNames.name: Sapiente dei Cieli Primigenia
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia non creatura, STAPpa la Sapiente dei Cieli Primigenia. Ha protezione da un colore a tua scelta fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: I sapienti dei cieli, elite della stirpe Ojutai, vedono i nemici come enigmi da risolvere.

foreignNames.name: 清純な空智
foreignNames.text:
飛行
あなたがクリーチャーでない呪文を１つ唱えるたび、清純な空智をアンタップする。色を１色選ぶ。ターン終了時まで、これはプロテクション（その選ばれた色）を得る。
foreignNames.flavor: オジュタイの落とし子の中でも精鋭である空智は、敵を解読すべき謎として見ている。

foreignNames.name: 고결한 창공의 현자
foreignNames.text:
비행
당신이 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동할 때마다, 고결한 창공의 현자를 언탭한다. 고결한 창공의 현자는 턴종료까지 당신이 선택한 색으로부터 보호를 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 오주타이 군의 정예 병력인 창공의 현자들은 적을 마치 풀어야할 퍼즐처럼 본다.

foreignNames.name: Sábio Celeste Prístino
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica que não seja de criatura, desvire Sábio Celeste Prístino. Ele ganha proteção contra a cor de sua escolha até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Os sábios celestes são a elite da prole de Ojutai e enxergam seus inimigos como enigmas a serem resolvidos.

foreignNames.name: Безупречный Небознатец
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, разверните Безупречного Небознатца. Он получает Защиту от выбранного вами цвета до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Небознатцы, элита среди оджутайцев, во врагах видят головоломки, которые нужно разгадать.

foreignNames.name: Sabiaceleste prístina
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que lances un hechizo que no sea de criatura, endereza la Sabiaceleste prístina. Gana protección contra el color de tu elección hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los sabiocelestes son la élite de la estirpe de Ójutai. Para ellos, los enemigos son rompecabezas que resolver.

cards.name: Pristine Skywise
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts."
—Silumgar, translated from Draconic

foreignNames.name: 利齿莽龙
foreignNames.text:
飞行
每当你牺牲一个生物时，目标对手牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「呈上死尸、头颅和碎骨。彼等悲号鬼魂即成吾人佳肴。」
～席穆嘉，译自龙语

foreignNames.name: 利齒莽龍
foreignNames.text:
飛行
每當你犧牲一個生物時，目標對手犧牲一個生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「呈上死屍、頭顱和碎骨。彼等悲號鬼魂即成吾人佳餚。」
～席穆嘉，譯自龍語

foreignNames.name: Croc-de-mort impitoyable
foreignNames.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que vous sacrifiez une créature, l'adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Approchez les morts, leurs carcasses et leurs ossements. Nous dégusterons leurs spectres gémissants. »
—Silumgar, traduit du draconique

foreignNames.name: Erbarmungsloser Todeszahn
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn du eine Kreatur opferst, opfert ein Gegner deiner Wahl eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Holt die Toten, ihre morschen Gebeine und klappernden Knochen. Wir werden uns an ihren klagenden Geistern laben."
—Silumgar, aus dem Drakonischen übersetzt

foreignNames.name: Zannaletale Spietata
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta sacrifichi una creatura, un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Portate i morti, i loro teschi ghignanti e le ossa scricchiolanti. Banchetteremo con le loro anime in pena."
—Silumgar, tradotto dal draconico

foreignNames.name: 無情な死牙
foreignNames.text:
飛行
あなたがクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げるたび、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor:
「死者と笑う髑髏、そしてカタカタ鳴る骨を持って参れ。彼の者たちの泣き喚く魂を喰らおうぞ。」
——シルムガル、龍詞からの翻訳

foreignNames.name: 무자비한 죽음송곳니
foreignNames.text:
비행
당신이 생물을 희생할 때마다, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"망자를 대령하라. 그 두개골과 갈비뼈도 잊지 말거라. 이제 그들의 울부짖는 유령으로 잔치를 벌이겠다."
—실룸가르의 용언에 대한 번역문

foreignNames.name: Presa Mortal Inclemente
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Toda vez que você sacrifica uma criatura, o oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Tragam os mortos, seus crânios sorridentes e seus ossos chocalhantes. Nós os devoraremos até suas almas lamuriantes."
— Silumgar, traduzido do dragônico

foreignNames.name: Беспощадный Клык Смерти
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда вы жертвуете существо, целевой оппонент жертвует существо.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Давайте сюда мертвецов, ухмыляющиеся черепа и гремящие кости. Мы полакомимся их стенающими душами».
— Силумгар, перевод с драконьего языка

foreignNames.name: Colmillomortal despiadada
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que sacrifiques una criatura, el oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Traigan a los muertos: sus calaveras sonrientes, sus huesos pulidos. Nos alimentaremos de sus espíritus aterrados".
—Sílumgar (traducción del dracónico)

cards.name: Ruthless Deathfang
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: Ruthless Deathfang’s triggered ability will trigger whenever you sacrifice any creature, including Ruthless Deathfang itself. It will trigger whenever you sacrifice a creature for any reason, including to pay a cost or as the result of a spell or ability (such as an opposing Ruthless Deathfang’s ability).
Notably, the “legend rule” does not cause any permanents to be sacrificed. They are simply put into their owners’ graveyards.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

foreignNames.name: 重获新生的萨坎
foreignNames.text:
+1：抓一张牌，然后加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。
−2：将一个4/4红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物放进战场。
−8：从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的龙生物牌，并将它们放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 重獲新生的薩坎
foreignNames.text:
+1：抽一張牌，然後加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。
−2：將一個4/4紅色，具飛行異能的龍衍生生物放進戰場。
−8：從你的牌庫中搜尋任意數量的龍生物牌，並將它們放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

foreignNames.name: Sarkhan inaltéré
foreignNames.text:
+1 : Piochez une carte, puis ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve.
−2 : Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 4/4 rouge Dragon avec le vol.
−8 : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque n'importe quel nombre de cartes de créature Dragon et mettez-les sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhan der Ungebrochene
foreignNames.text:
+1: Ziehe eine Karte und erhöhe dann deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
−2: Bringe einen 4/4 roten Drache-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
−8: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer beliebigen Anzahl an Drache-Kreaturenkarten und bringe diese ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhan Integro
foreignNames.text:
+1: Pesca una carta, poi aggiungi un mana di qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana.
−2: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Drago 4/4 rossa con volare.
−8: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per un qualsiasi numero di carte creatura Drago e mettile sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 揺るぎないサルカン
foreignNames.text:
＋１：カードを１枚引く。その後、あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色のマナ１点を加える。
－２：飛行を持つ赤の４/４のドラゴン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
－８：あなたのライブラリーから望む枚数のドラゴン・クリーチャー・カードを探し、それらを戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 완전한 사르칸
foreignNames.text:
+1: 카드 한 장을 뽑은 다음 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
-2: 비행을 가진 4/4 적색 용 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
-8: 당신의 서고에서 용 생물 카드를 원하는 만큼 찾아 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhan Revigorado
foreignNames.text:
+1: Compre um card e depois adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana.
-2: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura vermelha 4/4 do tipo Dragão com voar.
-8: Procure um número qualquer de cards de criatura do tipo Dragão em seu grimório e coloque-os no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Сархан Несломленный
foreignNames.text:
+1: возьмите карту, затем добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны.
−2: положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 4/4 красный Дракон с Полетом.
-8: найдите в вашей библиотеке любое количество карт существ-Драконов и положите их на поле битвы. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: Sarkhan invicto
foreignNames.text:
+1: Roba una carta, luego agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná.
-2: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Dragón roja 4/4 con la habilidad de volar.
-8: Busca en tu biblioteca cualquier cantidad de cartas de criatura Dragón y ponlas en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

cards.name: Sarkhan Unbroken
cards.originalText:
+1: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
−2: Put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
−8: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.text:
+1: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
−2: Put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
−8: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

foreignNames.name: 沸息蛮龙
foreignNames.text:
飞行
每当沸息蛮龙攻击时，加{R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}到你的法术力池中。直到回合结束，此法术力不会因步骤与阶段结束而从你的法术力池消失。

foreignNames.name: 沸息蠻龍
foreignNames.text:
飛行
每當沸息蠻龍攻擊時，加{R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}到你的魔法力池中。直到回合結束，此魔法力不會因步驟與階段結束而從你的魔法力池消失。

foreignNames.name: Ventegueule sauvage
foreignNames.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que la Ventegueule sauvage attaque, ajoutez {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} à votre réserve. Jusqu'à la fin du tour, ce mana ne disparaît pas de votre réserve quand les étapes et les phases se terminent.

foreignNames.name: Wildes Dampfmaul
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn das Wilde Dampfmaul angreift, erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird dieses Mana am Ende eines Segments oder einer Phase nicht aus deinem Manavorrat entfernt.

foreignNames.name: Sfiatofauce Selvaggia
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta la Sfiatofauce Selvaggia attacca, aggiungi {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} alla tua riserva di mana. Fino alla fine del turno, questo mana non viene rimosso dalla tua riserva di mana al termine di ogni fase o sottofase.

foreignNames.name: 凶暴な熱口
foreignNames.text:
飛行
凶暴な熱口が攻撃するたび、あなたのマナ・プールに{R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}を加える。ターン終了時まで、このマナはステップやフェイズの終了に際してあなたのマナ・プールから無くならない。

foreignNames.name: 난폭한 증기턱
foreignNames.text:
비행
난폭한 증기턱이 공격할 때마다, {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. 턴종료까지, 이 마나는 단과 단계가 종료되어도 당신의 마나풀에서 비워지지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Boca-de-vento Selvagem
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Boca-de-vento Selvagem atacar, adicione {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} à sua reserva de mana. Até o final do turno, este mana não sai de sua reserva de mana conforme as etapas e fases terminam.

foreignNames.name: Свирепый Дымозев
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда Свирепый Дымозев атакует, добавьте {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} в ваше хранилище маны. До конца хода эта мана не удаляется из вашего хранилища маны по окончании шагов и фаз.

foreignNames.name: Bocahumareda salvaje
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que la Bocahumareda salvaje ataque, agrega {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} a tu reserva de maná. Hasta el final del turno, este maná no se vacía de tu reserva de maná al final de las fases y los pasos.

cards.name: Savage Ventmaw
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Until end of turn, this mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

rulings.text: This mana won’t empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end for the remainder of the turn even if Savage Ventmaw leaves the battlefield during the turn.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Until end of turn, this mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

foreignNames.name: 席穆嘉的指命
foreignNames.text:
选择两项～
• 反击目标非生物咒语。
• 将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。
• 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。
• 消灭目标鹏洛客。

foreignNames.name: 席穆嘉的指命
foreignNames.text:
選擇兩項～
•反擊目標非生物咒語。
•將目標永久物移回其擁有者手上。
•目標生物得-3/-3直到回合結束。
•消滅目標鵬洛客。

foreignNames.name: Commandement de Silumgar
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez deux — 
• Contrecarrez le sort non-créature ciblé.
• Renvoyez le permanent ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.
• La créature ciblée gagne -3/-3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
• Détruisez le planeswalker ciblé.

foreignNames.name: Silumgars Befehl
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme zwei —
• Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
• Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
• Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -3/-3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
• Zerstöre einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl.

foreignNames.name: Comando di Silumgar
foreignNames.text:
Scegli due —
• Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio.
• Fai tornare un permanente bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
• Una creatura bersaglio prende -3/-3 fino alla fine del turno.
• Distruggi un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: シルムガルの命令
foreignNames.text:
以下から２つを選ぶ。
・クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
・パーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－３/－３の修整を受ける。
・プレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignNames.name: 실룸가르의 명령
foreignNames.text:
둘을 선택한다 —
• 생물 주문이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
• 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
• 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -3/-3을 받는다.
• 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레인즈워커를 파괴한다.

foreignNames.name: Comando de Silumgar
foreignNames.text:
Escolha dois —
• Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura.
• Devolva a permanente alvo para a mão de seu dono.
• A criatura alvo recebe -3/-3 até o final do turno.
• Destrua o planeswalker alvo.

foreignNames.name: Веление Силумгара
foreignNames.text:
Выберите два —
• Отмените целевое заклинание, не являющееся заклинанием существа.
• Верните целевой перманент в руку его владельца.
• Целевое существо получает -3/-3 до конца хода.
• Уничтожьте целевого planeswalker-а.

foreignNames.name: Mandato de Sílumgar
foreignNames.text:
Elige dos:
• Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura.
• Regresa el permanente objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
• La criatura objetivo obtiene -3/-3 hasta el final del turno.
• Destruye el planeswalker objetivo.

cards.name: Silumgar's Command
cards.originalText:
Choose two —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

rulings.text: You choose the two modes as you cast the spell. You must choose two different modes. Once modes are chosen, they can’t be changed.

You can choose a mode only if you can choose legal targets for that mode. Ignore the targeting requirements for modes that aren’t chosen. For example, you can cast Ojutai’s Command without targeting a creature spell provided you don’t choose the third mode.

As the spell resolves, follow the instructions of the modes you chose in the order they are printed on the card. For example, if you chose the second and fourth modes of Ojutai’s Command, you would gain 4 life and then draw a card. (The order won’t matter in most cases.)
If a Command is copied, the effect that creates the copy will usually allow you to choose new targets for the copy, but you can’t choose new modes.

If all targets for the chosen modes become illegal before the Command resolves, the spell will be countered and none of its effects will happen. If at least one target is still legal, the spell will resolve but will have no effect on any illegal targets.

cards.text:
Choose two —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

foreignNames.name: 迅袭战虐者
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当迅袭战虐者进战场时，你可以将一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的生物牌从你的手上或坟墓场放进战场。该生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 迅襲戰虐者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當迅襲戰虐者進戰場時，你可以將一張總魔法力費用等於或小於3的生物牌從你的手上或墳墓場放進戰場。該生物獲得敏捷異能。在下一個結束步驟開始時，將它移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: Escoufleguerre rapide
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand l'Escoufleguerre rapide arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez mettre sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière ou votre main une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à 3. Cette créature acquiert la célérité. Renvoyez-la dans votre main au début de la prochaine étape de fin.

foreignNames.name: Flinker Kriegsdrache
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Flinke Kriegsdrache ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder weniger aus deiner Hand oder deinem Friedhof ins Spiel bringen. Die Kreatur erhält Eile. Bringe sie zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Nibbio da Guerra Rapido
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando il Nibbio da Guerra Rapido entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi mettere sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3 dalla tua mano o dal tuo cimitero. Quella creatura ha rapidità. Riprendila in mano all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

foreignNames.name: 快速ウォーカイト
foreignNames.text:
飛行
快速ウォーカイトが戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたの手札かあなたの墓地にある点数で見たマナ・コストが３以下のクリーチャー・カードを１枚戦場に出してもよい。そのクリーチャーは速攻を得る。次の終了ステップの開始時に、それをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 날렵한 전투용
foreignNames.text:
비행
날렵한 전투용이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 손이나 무덤에서 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 생물 카드를 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 그 생물은 신속을 얻는다. 다음 종료단 시작에, 그 생물을 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Avérneo Belicoso Veloz
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Avérneo Belicoso Veloz entra no campo de batalha, você pode colocar no campo de batalha um card de criatura com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3 da sua mão ou do seu cemitério. Aquela criatura ganha ímpeto. Devolva-a para a sua mão no início da próxima etapa final.

foreignNames.name: Стремительный Боевой Змей
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Стремительный Боевой Змей выходит на поле битвы, вы можете положить карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 3 из вашей руки или кладбища на поле битвы. То существо получает Ускорение. Верните его в вашу руку в начале следующего заключительного шага.

foreignNames.name: Engendro de guerra veloz
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Engendro de guerra veloz entre al campo de batalla, puedes poner en el campo de batalla una carta de criatura con coste de maná convertido de 3 o menos de tu mano o de tu cementerio. Esa criatura gana la habilidad de prisa. Regrésala a tu mano al comienzo del próximo paso final.

cards.name: Swift Warkite
cards.originalText:
Flying
When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: You can’t put creatures onto the battlefield face down this way.

The creature you put onto the battlefield will be returned to your hand only if it’s still on the battlefield as the delayed triggered ability resolves during the next end step. If it leaves the battlefield before then, it will remain wherever it is.
The delayed triggered ability that returns the creature to your hand will trigger even if Swift Warkite leaves the battlefield before the next end step.

cards.text:
Flying
When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.

foreignNames.name: 先祖雕像
foreignNames.text: 当先祖雕像进战场时，将一个由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 法师原希望唤醒雕像能够从中获知部落亡佚知识，然而雕像所晓只有战事。

foreignNames.name: 先祖雕像
foreignNames.text: 當先祖雕像進戰場時，將一個由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 法師原希望喚醒雕像能夠從中獲知部落亡佚知識，然而雕像所曉只有戰事。

foreignNames.name: Statue ancestrale
foreignNames.text: Quand la Statue ancestrale arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez un permanent non-terrain que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: La mage réveilla la statue dans l'espoir d'apprendre les traditions perdues de son clan, mais la statue n'avait d'intérêt que pour la guerre.

foreignNames.name: Ahnenstatue
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Ahnenstatue ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine bleibende Karte, die du kontrollierst und die kein Land ist, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Magierin erweckte die Statue in der Hoffnung auf das verlorene Wissen ihres Klans, doch die Statue hatte nur Krieg im Sinn.

foreignNames.name: Statua Ancestrale
foreignNames.text: Quando la Statua Ancestrale entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare un permanente non terra che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La maga risvegliò la statua nella speranza di apprendere il sapere perduto del suo clan, ma la statua era interessata solo alla guerra.

foreignNames.name: 祖先の像
foreignNames.text: 祖先の像が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールする土地でないパーマネントを１つオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 魔道士は自分の氏族の失われた知識が得られることを期待して石像を覚醒させたが、石像が興味を持っていたのは戦争だけだった。

foreignNames.name: 고대 석상
foreignNames.text: 고대 석상이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 대지가 아닌 지속물 한 개를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그 마도사는 자신의 부족에 전승되던 지식을 알아내기 위해 석상을 깨웠지만 석상은 오직 전쟁에만 관심이 있었다.

foreignNames.name: Estátua Ancestral
foreignNames.text: Quando Estátua Ancestral entrar no campo de batalha, devolva uma permanente que não seja terreno que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: A maga despertou a estátua na esperança de aprender sobre os conhecimentos perdidos de seu clã, mas a estátua só estava interessada na guerra.

foreignNames.name: Статуя Предка
foreignNames.text: Когда Статуя Предка выходит на поле битвы, верните не являющийся землей перманент под вашим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Волшебница пробудила статую в надежде обрести потерянные знания своего клана, но статую влекла лишь война.

foreignNames.name: Estatua ancestral
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Estatua ancestral entre al campo de batalla, regresa un permanente que controlas y que no sea tierra a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La maga despertó a la estatua con la esperanza de saber más sobre las tradiciones perdidas de su clan, pero a la efigie solo le interesaba la guerra.

cards.name: Ancestral Statue
cards.originalText: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Ancestral Statue’s ability is mandatory. If Ancestral Statue is the only nonland permanent you control when its ability resolves, you must return it to its owner’s hand.
The triggered ability doesn’t target any permanent. You choose which one to return as the ability resolves. No player can respond to this choice once the ability starts resolving.

cards.text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: Atarka is worshipped and fed by her subjects at Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl.

foreignNames.name: 安塔卡纪念碑
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。
{4}{R}{G}：直到回合结束，安塔卡纪念碑成为4/4，红绿双色，具飞行异能的龙神器生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 安塔卡钟爱巨龙盆地阿亚戈，子民朝拜供奉之礼均在此处行之。

foreignNames.name: 安塔卡紀念碑
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的魔法力池中。
{4}{R}{G}：直到回合結束，安塔卡紀念碑成為4/4，紅綠雙色，具飛行異能的龍神器生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 安塔卡鐘愛巨龍盆地阿亞戈，子民朝拜供奉之禮均在此處行之。

foreignNames.name: Monument d'Atarka
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G} à votre réserve.
{4}{R}{G} : Le Monument d'Atarka devient une créature-artefact 4/4 rouge et verte Dragon avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka est vénérée et nourrie par ses sujets à Ayagor, le Bol du dragon.

foreignNames.name: Denkmal der Atarka
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder {G}.
{4}{R}{G}: Das Denkmal der Atarka wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 4/4 roten und grünen Drache-Artefaktkreatur mit Flugfähigkeit.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka wird von ihren Untertanen in Ayagor, dem Drachenkessel, verehrt und genährt.

foreignNames.name: Monumento ad Atarka
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.
{4}{R}{G}: Il Monumento ad Atarka diventa una creatura artefatto Drago 4/4 rossa e verde con volare fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka è venerata e nutrita dai suoi sudditi ad Ayagor, la Conca del Drago.

foreignNames.name: アタルカの碑
foreignNames.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{G}を加える。
{4}{R}{G}：ターン終了時まで、アタルカの碑は飛行を持つ赤であり緑である４/４のドラゴン・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。
foreignNames.flavor: 龍の鉢とも呼ばれるアヤゴールでアタルカは崇拝され、臣下たちによって食料が提供されている。

foreignNames.name: 아타르카 기념비
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{4}{R}{G}: 아타르카 기념비는 턴종료까지 비행을 가진 적색이며 녹색인 4/4 용 마법물체 생물이 된다.
foreignNames.flavor: 아타르카는 용의 사발이라고 부르는 아야고르에서 추종자들에게 숭배받으며 먹을 것을 대접받는다.

foreignNames.name: Monumento a Atarka
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.
{4}{R}{G}: Monumento a Atarka torna-se uma criatura artefato vermelha e verde 4/4 do tipo Dragão com voar até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Atarka é adorada e alimentada por seus servos em Ayagor, a Taça do Dragão.

foreignNames.name: Монумент Атарки
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {R} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.
{4}{R}{G}: Монумент Атарки становится артефактом существом 4/4 красный и зеленый Дракон с Полетом до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Подданные Атарки поклоняются ей и подносят ей угощения в Аягоре, Чаше Дракона.

foreignNames.name: Monumento a Atarka
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.
{4}{R}{G}: El Monumento a Atarka se convierte en una criatura artefacto Dragón roja y verde 4/4 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los súbditos de Atarka la veneran y alimentan en Ayagor, el Valle de la Dragona.

cards.name: Atarka Monument
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: A Monument can’t attack on the turn it enters the battlefield.
Each Monument is colorless, although the last ability will make each of them two colors until end of turn.

If a Monument has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain on the permanent after it stops being a creature. Those counters will have no effect as long as the Monument isn’t a creature, but they will apply again if the Monument later becomes a creature.

Activating the last ability of a Monument while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power or toughness to a specific value. Effects that modify power or toughness without directly setting them to a specific value will continue to apply.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Silumgar delights in repurposing the treasures of other clans to serve his own ravenous greed.

foreignNames.name: 宝库监管者
foreignNames.text:

cards.name: Dromoka Monument
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{4}{G}{W}: Dromoka Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: A Monument can’t attack on the turn it enters the battlefield.
Each Monument is colorless, although the last ability will make each of them two colors until end of turn.

If a Monument has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain on the permanent after it stops being a creature. Those counters will have no effect as long as the Monument isn’t a creature, but they will apply again if the Monument later becomes a creature.

Activating the last ability of a Monument while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power or toughness to a specific value. Effects that modify power or toughness without directly setting them to a specific value will continue to apply.

cards.name: Keeper of the Lens
cards.originalText: You may look at face-down creatures you don't control. (You may do this at any time.)

rulings.text: Keeper of the Lens allows you to look at face-down creatures you don’t control whenever you want to, even if you don’t have priority. This action doesn’t use the stack.
Keeper of the Lens doesn’t stop your opponents from looking at face-down creatures they control.
Keeper of the Lens doesn’t let you look at other players’ face-down spells while they’re on the stack.

If a Monument has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain on the permanent after it stops being a creature. Those counters will have no effect as long as the Monument isn’t a creature, but they will apply again if the Monument later becomes a creature.

Activating the last ability of a Monument while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power or toughness to a specific value. Effects that modify power or toughness without directly setting them to a specific value will continue to apply.

foreignNames.name: 龍炎瓶
foreignNames.text: {2}，{T}，犧牲龍炎瓶：龍炎瓶對目標生物造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 這種瓶子傳自古代兵匠之手，瓶身堅固到足以將巨龍吐息貯存其間～留到需要時使用。

foreignNames.name: Fiole de feu des dragons
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, sacrifiez la Fiole de feu des dragons : La Fiole de feu des dragons inflige 2 blessures à la créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Conçues par un vieil artificier, ces fioles sont suffisamment solides pour contenir le souffle d'un dragon... jusqu'à ce qu'on en ait besoin.

foreignNames.name: Phiole mit Drachenfeuer
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, opfere die Phiole mit Drachenfeuer: Die Phiole mit Drachenfeuer fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Diese Phiolen wurden einst von einem Meisterhandwerker gefertigt und sind stark genug, um den Atem eines Drachen zu fassen – bis er benötigt wird.

foreignNames.name: Fiala di Fuoco Draconico
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifica la Fiala di Fuoco Draconico: La Fiala di Fuoco Draconico infligge 2 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Progettate da un antico artefice, le fiale sono abbastanza forti da contenere anche il soffio di un drago... finché è necessario.

foreignNames.name: 龍火の薬瓶
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, 龍火の薬瓶を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。龍火の薬瓶はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 大昔の工匠によって造られた薬瓶は、必要となるまで龍の吐息を保存しておけるだけの強度を持っている。

foreignNames.name: 용의 불을 담은 병
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, 용의 불을 담은 병을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 용의 불을 담은 병은 그 생물에 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 옛 장인이 만든 이 병은 용의 숨결을 담을 만큼 튼튼했다.

foreignNames.name: Frasco de Fogo Dragônico
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifique Frasco de Fogo Dragônico: Frasco de Fogo Dragônico causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Criados por um antigo artesão, estes frascos são resistentes o bastante para armazenar até sopro de dragão... antes de serem abertos.

foreignNames.name: Флакон Драконьего Огня
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Флакон Драконьего Огня: Флакон Драконьего Огня наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу.
foreignNames.flavor: Эти созданные древним мастером флаконы достаточно прочны, чтобы удержать смертоносное дыхание дракона — до тех пор, пока оно не понадобится.

foreignNames.name: Frasco de fuegodragón
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar el Frasco de fuegodragón: El Frasco de fuegodragón hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Diseñados por un antiguo artífice, los frascos son lo suficientemente fuertes para contener el aliento de un dragón... hasta que haga falta.

cards.name: Vial of Dragonfire
cards.originalText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Vial of Dragonfire: Vial of Dragonfire deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Vial of Dragonfire: Vial of Dragonfire deals 2 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地坚韧不息；即使死去，也必重生。

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，並將之橫置進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地堅韌不息；即使死去，也必重生。

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: La terre s'adapte toujours. Si elle vient à mourir, elle finira par renaître.

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte und bringe sie getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Land wärt ewig. Es folgt dem Zyklus von Tod und Wiedergeburt.

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: La terra resiste sempre. Se muore, rinascerà.

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地の回復力は尽きることはない。たとえ死しても、それは再び蘇る。

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 땅은 회복력이 대단하다. 혹시 죽더라도 결국에는 되살아난다.

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: A terra resiste a tudo. Mesmo que morra, renasce.

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ее на поле битвы повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Нет ничего выносливее земли. Погибнув, она возрождается вновь.

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: La resistencia de la tierra es infinita. Si muriese, renacería.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

foreignNames.name: 灵龙庇护地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。此法术力只能用来施放龙生物咒语。
{2}，{T}，牺牲灵龙庇护地：将目标龙生物牌或乌金鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 靈龍庇護地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。
{T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。此魔法力只能用來施放龍生物咒語。
{2}，{T}，犧牲靈龍庇護地：將目標龍生物牌或烏金鵬洛客牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: Havre du dragon-esprit
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort de créature Dragon.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez le Havre du dragon-esprit : Renvoyez une carte de créature Dragon ciblée ou une carte de planeswalker Ugin depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Zuflucht des Geisterdrachen
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um einen Drache-Kreaturenzauber zu wirken.
{2}, {T}, opfere die Zuflucht des Geisterdrachen: Bringe eine Drache-Kreaturenkarte oder eine Ugin-Planeswalkerkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Rifugio dello Spirito Drago
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia creatura Drago.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica il Rifugio dello Spirito Drago: Riprendi in mano dal tuo cimitero una carta creatura Drago o una carta planeswalker Ugin bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 精霊龍の安息地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、ドラゴン・クリーチャー・呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。
{2}, {T}, 精霊龍の安息地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地にあるドラゴン・クリーチャー・カード１枚かウギン・プレインズウォーカー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 신령 용의 안식처
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. 이 마나는 용 생물 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
{2}, {T}, 신령 용의 안식처를 희생한다: 당신의 무덤에 있는 용 생물 카드나 우진 플레인즈워커 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Refúgio do Dragão Espírito
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana. Gaste este mana apenas para conjurar uma mágica de criatura do tipo Dragão.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifique Refúgio do Dragão Espírito: Devolva o card alvo de criatura do tipo Dragão ou de Planeswalker do tipo Ugin do seu cemitério para a sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Убежище Духа Дракона
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.
{T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинания существа-Дракона.
{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Убежище Духа Дракона: верните целевую карту существа-Дракона или карту planeswalker-а Уджина из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: Refugio del dragón espíritu
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo de criatura Dragón.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Refugio del dragón espíritu: Regresa la carta de criatura Dragón objetivo o la carta de planeswalker de Ugin de tu cementerio a tu mano.

cards.name: Haven of the Spirit Dragon
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: The mana produced by Haven of the Spirit Dragon’s second ability can be used to pay for any additional or alternative costs (such as dash costs) involved in casting a Dragon creature spell.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
